Later Offred is taken away in a black van to be interrogated by an Eye and Aunt Lydia about her knowledge of Ofglen, who has been taken to a detention centre. In a flashback to the rise of Gilead, June and her female colleagues are fired and the government orders a freeze on bank accounts held by women. Elisabeth Moss stars.(n)

Kirstie is scouting for properties in the borough of Richmond for Carolyn and Paul - a native of Sheffield who is struggling to get his head around London's inflated prices.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

Penny tries to support his ambitions, while Sheldon is jealous and attempts to discourage him from accepting the post. Meanwhile, Raj pushes the boundaries with Lucy, but puts their relationship in jeopardy.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny struggles with Leonard's confession that he kissed another woman when he was away on his North Sea research expedition. After driving all the way to Las Vegas, she must now decide whether she wants to go through with the wedding. Back home, Sheldon doesn't know how to act after Amy tells him she wants them to take a relationship break.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Hard-hearted Mr Burns decides to deny his employees any more free medication, prompting Homer to whisk Grampa away on a drug-smuggling mission to Canada. Unfortunately, the duo fall foul of the authorities on their return journey.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart attends a rock concert with Milhouse, so Marge and Homer buy him a guitar to encourage his musical interests - but it is Otto who ends up calling the tune. Featuring the voices of Spinal Tap members Michael McKean and Christopher Guest.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Milhouse falls in love with a new girl at school and begins to spend all his time with her, so, in a bid to get his friend back, Bart decides to tell her strict Catholic father about the relationship.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition kicks off at the Bell House Hotel in Wiltshire, where business partners Chris Williams and Jacqui Hogg hope guests will appreciate their attempts to bring London chic to the shires. Susan and David Speak are frustrated by the low shower pressure, while Jade Hendon butts heads with Matthew over healthy eating at dinner and the hosts' absence at breakfast the next morning gets the criticism flowing.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to The Partridge in Oxfordshire, where young couple Matthew Cockman and Paula Szkwarkowska hope guests will get on board with their passion for local organic food. A communal bathroom has the guests lost for words, and the lack of a hot breakfast included in the price leaves a bad taste in everyone's mouths.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants travel to Strawberry Gardens B&B in Heysham for the third day of the contest, where husband and wife team Susan and David Speak offer home-from-home accommodation and an abundance of northern hospitality. Sports enthusiast David treats his guests to a traditional darts competition, adjudicated by former world champion Alan Warriner-Little, but he is unimpressed when Paula sends back her evening meal. However, it is Chris and Jacqui's feedback that disappoints the hosts the most.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit of the week is to the Bateman's Mill near Chesterfield, where manager Jade Hendon has high hopes of being the best. But she faces an uphill battle when David and Susan go out of their way to find hairs in the bathroom - and to make mattters worse, her Derbyshire breakfast is not a hit with Chris and Jacqui.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed

The group members proceed to thrash out their differences before the week's winners are revealed.(n)

programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, featuring the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Ava's stepfather Brian turns up to take her home and clashes with Justin, leading to an accident. VJ confides in Olivia about his conflicting emotions over losing Luc and Billie.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Jack tells Amy he is feeling very lost with the new direction he has taken, Paul is uneasy over Terese and Gary's friendship and Shane decides to give up on his dream.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen, Hanna and the team search for a group of terrorists suspected of murdering an ex-army sergeant. Meanwhile, Deeks and Kensi continue to bond. Starring Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J.(n)

programme.title: Buried Secrets
programme.desc: Former cop Sarah Winters publishes her first novel, and finds herself on the wrong side of the law when her book's plot seems to mirror an all-too-real murder case. Thriller, starring Sarah Carter.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Jack tells Amy he is feeling very lost with the new direction he has taken, Paul is uneasy over Terese and Gary's friendship and Shane decides to give up on his dream.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Ava's stepfather Brian turns up to take her home and clashes with Justin, leading to an accident. VJ confides in Olivia about his conflicting emotions over losing Luc and Billie.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Hoppsy goes after a disqualified motorist who hurdles two fences in his attempts to get away, Damo deploys a stinger in a bid to stop a drunk driver and Kev solves the mystery of a car abandoned in a field. Plus, Spike deals with a drug driver with a mouthy girlfriend and Lee has a strange weekend involving a burning car, two inebriated men and a large garden gnome.(n)

programme.title: There's a Croc in My Kitchen
programme.desc: Documentary following people around Britain who keep predatory wild animals as unusual pets. Chris Weller from Kent owns a crocodile, and spent £20,000 converting his house to accommodate the dangerous reptile, while in Gloucester, Patricia and her sons live with a serval, a big cat that is one of Africa's deadliest hunters. Jim and Chris own a 20-stone Komodo dragon, while Terry fears his pet lynx Pudding may have been poisoned. Devon resident Andre owns a wolf hybrid that shares her bed - but fears he may be on his last legs.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: The housemates gather on the sofas once more as Emma Willis hosts the latest eviction, revealing which of this week's nominees the public have voted out, then chatting to them about their time on the show, who they think voted for them and why they feel it was their time to go. But before that, there's the question of seeing how they've all been getting on in the regular round-up.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal discusses tonight's eviction, asking the panel whether the public made the right decision, talking to Emma Willis and meeting the unlucky ex-housemate.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.sub-title: Big Brother: Live from the House: 16/06/2017.
programme.desc: Live streaming action, picking up with the hopefuls to reveal how they are getting on since saying goodbye to another housemate in tonight's eviction.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: The housemates gather on the sofas once more as Emma Willis hosts the latest eviction, revealing which of this week's nominees the public have voted out, then chatting to them about their time on the show, who they think voted for them and why they feel it was their time to go. But before that, there's the question of seeing how they've all been getting on in the regular round-up.(n)

programme.title: Lip Sync Battle UK
programme.sub-title: Lip Sync Battle UK: Peter Andre vs Gino D'Acampo.
programme.desc: Melanie Brown and Professor Green present the musical game show as reality star Peter Andre and presenter and Italian TV chef Gino D'Acampo go head to head lip-synching to hit songs. Their first choice of song is anticipated to be relatively sober, but for their second the celebs must bring it all to the floor - with wigs, costumes and backing dancers.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Property expert Ann Maurice visits Kent to offer advice to a Maidstone homeowner looking to relocate after his girlfriend moved out and took most of the furniture with her.(n)

programme.title: House Busters
programme.desc: Janet Ellis meets a homeowner who feels trapped in her property, and has seen various attempts to sell it fall through. She receives advice from a feng shui expert, who claims she is too fixated on the past, a `home healer', who diagnoses low energy levels in the property, and a mystic who announces that the tree outside her bedroom window has to go.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: A fox cub shows symptoms of a life-threatening condition, and a young badger reacts badly to goat's milk.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey
programme.desc: The inquisitive puppet becomes a dentist's assistant for the day.(n)

programme.title: The Mr Men Show
programme.desc: The gang visits the seaside, where gulls try to steal Mr Grumpy's sandwich, Mr Pernickety has an unpleasant experience and Mr Bump needs medical attention.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Suzy and Peppa start a secret club, but soon everyone wants to join.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig goes to Grampy Rabbit's boatyard to get his boat fixed.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: To win the Spotless Town award, the Paw Patrol pups must save Adventure Bay from Mayor Humdinger's kitten catastrophe crew.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The team use explosives to demolish an old factory, but Lofty has to learn not to jump at the bangs.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Everyone is excited about the Pontypandy Flower and Vegetable Show being held in the Floods' garden.(n)

programme.title: Olly the Little White Van
programme.desc: The bridge leading into Bumpton gets damaged, preventing Max and Tom from making their deliveries into town, so Olly and Stan try to see if they can help.(n)

programme.title: Olly the Little White Van
programme.desc: The friends go on a trip with Captain Barnacle, but when Bazza accidentally sinks their boats they get stranded on a desert island and have to wait to be rescued.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: When Marshall decides to take a break from the Paw Patrol, the pups jump into action to bring him back.(n)

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Crusher overloads the truck wash with too much soap, Axle City disappears under a blanket of soap suds, leaving Blaze and AJ to track down the missing parts and rebuild it.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of Deltoid's Strange Behaviour.
programme.desc: Smartysaurus is upset because her best friend Deltoid keeps running away from her, so Noddy tries to get to the bottom of the mystery.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Ritchie the ostrich has lost his sister. She is too small to see over the long grass in Ritchie's world, so Wissper summons Herbert the shire horse so she can ride on his back.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Holly, Ben and the Wise Old Elf play a trick on Nanny Plum.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Double-length episode. An evil sorceress steals the genies' new gem and uses it to transport Leah and Zac to another world.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: One of the princess's teeth falls out just before she has to pose for a photograph.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle brings lots of musical instruments into the playgroup for the children.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy loses his title as champion puddle-jumper.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The king comes to visit, but Nanny accidentally shrinks all his clothes - and has to make some more using vegetables from the kitchen.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: April faces a deadly, new enemy when she graduates to full Kunoichi and the Turtles must deal with the return of some old foes.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Officers have to bring a suspicious car to an abrupt halt, leading to a bumper haul of drugs, while a quad biker evades Jacko before apparently having a change of heart. Danger seems to be around every corner for Jimmy as he deals with separate reports of shotgun and machete offences.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Kev Salter takes drastic action to stop a vehicle he suspects has class-A drugs on board, while a nasty street fight leads to a Taser being drawn. Mark Shepherd has his work cut out when a late-night pursuit heads off-road, and the arrest of a wanted man leads to drugs and a lethal weapon being discovered.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: To Heat or to Eat?.
programme.desc: A single father with six children cannot afford to both feed his family and heat their home, while a man who was seriously injured in a car accident more than 10 years ago struggles to prove to the authorities that he is unable to work, and a woman setting up a fortune telling business faces an uncertain future.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Benefits Handout
programme.desc: Three long-term unemployed families on benefits are given a cash lump sum of £26,000 in return for signing off, to see if they have what it takes to improve their lives and escape the benefits trap. This opening episode introduces the three families, including Tony and Diane from Hull and their 21-year-old son Michael, who persuades his parents to let him buy the latest PlayStation. Scott and Leanne from Liverpool order some bouncy castles as they start a party business, while single mum Rachel treats her family and friends to an all-you-can-eat Chinese buffet.(n)

programme.title: The Nightmare Neighbour Next Door
programme.desc: A mature student in Nottinghamshire suffered when the woman downstairs turned her flat into a 24/7 party house - yet worse was to come when it all went quiet. A Northampton cat-lover discovered a shocking secret in a neighbour's back garden after three of her beloved pets went missing, and a single dad's relations with a neighbour turned sour after a series of strange occurrences in Chiswick.(n)

programme.title: The Nightmare Neighbour Next Door
programme.desc: Jessica's fresh start in Stockport was made easier by her next-door neighbour Daniel - until the arrival of an unexpected visitor revealed the truth about him. A doctor expected a few problems when she moved from the south of England to the north - but nothing could prepare her for the disruption caused by her neighbour's large extension, a redevelopment which took over her garden and, eventually, her life. Plus, the story of a man who was delighted when an old friend moved in next door - until he was accused of making a complaint about their driveway.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: High Court Enforcement agents evict a large group of squatters barricaded into a disused nursery in London, and have to resort to smashing their way in as they refuse to leave. Meanwhile, agents in Bristol try to recover over £10,000 owed by a plumbing business to a supplier, and emotions run high when they attempt to evict a tenant who pleads her innocence in West London.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: In South East London, officers Gary and Cona chase a debt of nearly £50,000 in unpaid rent, leading to a feisty confrontation with the debtor. Elsewhere, agents Gary and Paul try to recover over £2,000 owed by a teenager to a local garage in Kent, and officers Max and Paul head to South West London on the trail of a film producer who owes £8,000 to financial advisers.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Iain Lee narrates a selection of zany online clips featuring cats demonstrating their now-renowned capacity for mischief. Dave Spikey, Matt Richardson and Andi Osho are on hand to help highlight the feline fails.(n)

programme.title: Blind Date
programme.desc: New series. Paul O'Grady hosts a revival of the dating show in which contestants must choose between three unseen suitors based on their answers to a series of questions. The first episode sees a woman from Southport and a man with an eight-inch beard asking the questions, while cameras also follow two strangers from different backgrounds on a blind date in Barcelona.(n)

programme.title: Before They Were Stars
programme.desc: Dale Winton treks back through the TV archive to uncover embarrassing early brushes with fame endured by some of today's biggest stars. Among those skewered are pop stars, rock legends, silver-screen icons, celebrated comedians and sporting heroes.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing the housemates' reactions to the second eviction, as well as the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs and diary room visits. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Comedy Store
programme.sub-title: Michael McIntyre: Live at the Comedy Store.
programme.desc: The comedian performs at the famous Soho comedy club, discussing topics including shopping, politics, what Brits call extreme weather, Scottish money and pregnancy tests.(n)

programme.title: The Story of
programme.desc: Documentary about the comedian's rise to fame, examining the influence of his fellow comedian father on his early routines before his eventual breakthrough performance at the 2006 Royal Variety show. The programme also explores how he has been involved in series that have reinvented stand-up comedy on TV, including Live at the Apollo and Comedy Roadshow.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: A former FBI agent takes under his wing a young boy with autism whose parents were murdered. He soon discovers that the boy has deciphered a top secret government code and now his life is threatened by a ruthless official(n)

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: A double Oscar-winner (best sound and best screenplay), The Exorcist is a film unmatched in its combination of shock, terror, writing and performances, providing an evocative portrayal of a young girl possessed. Oscar-nominated Linda Blair is Regan MacNeil, an innocent young girl transformed into a masturbating and murderous creature(n)

programme.title: Bikini: Una historia real
programme.desc: In 1950s Spain, a small-town mayor wants to convince everyone to allow women to wear bikinis on the beach(n)

programme.title: Silk
programme.desc: Francois Girard's adaptation of Alessandro Baricco's novel Silk stars Michael Pitt as a young Frenchman who travels to Japan at the request of a wealthy silkworm magnate who asks him to smuggle back some new worms. The mission succeeds, and this allows the man to live in great comfort with his wife (Keira Knightley). After a few years, they are unable to conceive a child, a situation that leads to the man taking on a lover during his subsequent visits to Japan(n)

programme.title: Stir of Echoes: The Homecoming
programme.desc: This direct-to-DVD sequel features Rob Lowe as an Iraq War veteran whose past comes back to haunt him in Stir of Echoes: The Homecoming. Upon returning home from the line of duty, National Guard Captain Ted Cogan thought his life would go back to normal, until he started seeing visions of a group of innocent bystanders he inadvertently killed in Iraq. With his family on the brink of destruction, Ted turns to a psychic that aids him in understanding what needs to be done to put these restless souls at peace - even if it means giving up his own life(n)

programme.title: Francisco: el Padre Jorge
programme.desc: A journalist recalls memories of her friend Jorge Mario Bergoglio, the man who would later be known as Pope Francis(n)

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: Arnie's at his best as tough L.A. detective John Kimble who must find a drug lord's wife so she can testify in court. Problem is, she's gone into hiding to protect her son. With only the name of the kid's elementary school, Kimble must go undercover... As a kindergarten teacher! Academy Award winner Linda Hunt joins the cast with Academy Award nominee Cathy Moriarty in this great blend of action, thrills, and humor(n)

programme.title: The Soloist
programme.desc: LA journalist Steve Lopez begins writing a column about a mentally ill homeless man with a talent for playing the cello. Lopez tries to help improve his life, but finds his new friend's state of mind a stumbling block(n)

programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: When he has a vision of his flight to Paris crashing, a teen travelling with his French club makes a scene and they are all kicked off the airline. The plane goes down and the survivors are grateful, but Death hunts them down(n)

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: Set in the Depression of the '30s in southern United States, this drama portrays the remarkable relationship established between Paul Edgecomb (Tom Hanks), a prison guard on Death Row, and John Coffey (Michael Clarke Duncan), a hefty colored man sentenced to death for a brutal double homicide. As the days go by, and after some surprising experiences, Edgecomb begins to have doubts about Coffey's culpability. He is a naïve, apprehensive man with a supernatural gift. Based on a novel by Stephen King, this drama received four Oscar nominations(n)

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: After her latest boyfriend cheats on her, unlucky-in-love Martha (Anna Kendrick) falls for an oddly principled hit man (Sam Rockwell) who has decided to kill anyone who hires him to commit murder. While Martha believes she's finally found the perfect guy, their romance is threatened by an FBI agent (Tim Roth) who's hunting her new beau. Written by Max Landis and directed by Paco Cabezas, Mr. Right made its world premiere at the 2015 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: In this raunchy yet heartfelt comedy, a commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must reevaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care(n)

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Two daffy adult sisters throw one last raging party in their childhood home before it's sold by their parents, with disastrous results(n)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: Best Actor nominee Tom Hanks delivers as airfreight exec Chuck Noland, a plane crash survivor who washes ashore on a deserted island in the Pacific. For more than four years he struggles to stay alive, sustained only by the companionship of a volleyball and memories of his girlfriend (Helen Hunt). Robert Zemeckis ("Forrest Gump") directed. Chris Noth, Nick Searcy(n)

programme.title: The Young Messiah
programme.desc: As his family travel from Egypt to Nazareth, a 7-year-old Jesus wishes to learn more about his identity and place in the world in this stirring biblical drama. Meanwhile, Herod Antipas dispatches a Roman centurion to kill the boy, whose miraculous powers might be a threat to his reign(n)

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: Cinema One Global provides hours of entertainment for avid followers of Philippine movies, dramas and showbiz. Stay tuned to another great programme!(n)

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: Charming biopic of entrepreneur Joy Mangano, a divorced mother of two who risks her life's savings to create the Miracle Mop. The success of that product leads to a home-shopping empire and her ascension to matriarch of her family(n)

programme.title: Right at Your Door
programme.desc: Doomsday comes to LA in this gripping tale of terror, panic and paranoia. When dirty bombs are detonated over Southern California, a husband (Rory Cochrane) and his wife (Mary McCormack) become quarantined, he inside their house, she outside. As contaminated ash rains down from the sky, chaos reigns across the area as those left out in the open run the risk of being poisoned by the fatal toxins. The film is the directorial debut of production designer Chris Gorak, who also wrote the script(n)

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: Mysterious loner Paul, headed to Mexico with his collie at his side, stumbles into a small-town saloon. There, he brawls with a gang and finds himself exiled by the town marshal, which sparks a bloody quest for revenge in this clever, offbeat Western(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: Epic romantic adventure, set just prior to World War II, about an English aristocrat and the rugged drover who helps her with the cattle station she inherited(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An FBI agent goes undercover and infiltrates a group of extreme athletes in order to prove they are using their specialised skills to pull off a series of complex crimes. The film is inspired by the 1991 cult hit of the same name(n)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: One of Marvel Comics' most popular characters comes to the screen for the first time in this sci-fi action-thriller. Matthew Murdock (Ben Affleck) is a lawyer whose father, a prizefighter, was killed by gangsters when Murdock was just a boy. Since then, Murdock has devoted his life to bringing wrongdoers to justice and is willing to help others by taking on cases no other attorney will touch. Murdock is also blind, after being struck down by a truck while trying to save a man from being hit. What no one knows is that Murdock was also doused with an unusual radioactive isotope which had a strange effect on him -- while Murdock's sight may be gone, his other senses have been raised to such a keen pitch that they act like radar, allowing him to tell where he's going and what happens around him, both near and far away. Murdock puts his gifts to use at night as the costumed crime-fighter Daredevil, whose pursuit of justice has earned him the wrath of underworld leader Kingpin (Michael Clarke Duncan). Kingpin wants Daredevil out of his way once and for all, and hires Bullseye (Colin Farrell), a super-assassin with an uncanny ability to throw blades, to do the job. Daredevil also makes the acquaintance of Elektra Natchios (Jennifer Garner), a woman with super-heroic talents who is also on Kingpin's bad side, though it remains to be seen if she has aligned herself with the forces of good as Daredevil has done. Jon Favreau, Joe Pantoliano, and David Keith highlight Daredevil's supporting cast(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: Buckle up for a wild ride as Paul Walker ("Joy Ride") and Vin Diesel ("Pitch Black") put the pedal to the metal in this high-octane action thriller. Diesel plays the leader of a gang of L.A. street racers who moonlight in highway robbery; Walker is the undercover cop who befriends him. Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster, Rick Yune, Chad Lindberg(n)

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: To clear his criminal record a former LA cop must infiltrate the Miami street racing scene to set up a drug baron. Burning rubber all over the city with his ex-con friend, he attempts to deliver the crook to the FBI without crashing and being blown to pieces in one of the many explosions(n)

programme.title: La pantalla desnuda
programme.desc: The lives of a woman and her boyfriend are irrevocably altered when a sex tape of them is released online by an infatuated mutual friend(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Writer-director Paul WS Anderson tunes-up Roger Corman's 1975 cult vehicle "Death Race 2000" in this action flick about a contest pitting a convict against other convicts, with the winner walking off with his freedom(n)

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: A former FBI agent takes under his wing a young boy with autism whose parents were murdered. He soon discovers that the boy has deciphered a top secret government code and now his life is threatened by a ruthless official(n)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: One of Marvel Comics' most popular characters comes to the screen for the first time in this sci-fi action-thriller. Matthew Murdock (Ben Affleck) is a lawyer whose father, a prizefighter, was killed by gangsters when Murdock was just a boy. Since then, Murdock has devoted his life to bringing wrongdoers to justice and is willing to help others by taking on cases no other attorney will touch. Murdock is also blind, after being struck down by a truck while trying to save a man from being hit. What no one knows is that Murdock was also doused with an unusual radioactive isotope which had a strange effect on him -- while Murdock's sight may be gone, his other senses have been raised to such a keen pitch that they act like radar, allowing him to tell where he's going and what happens around him, both near and far away. Murdock puts his gifts to use at night as the costumed crime-fighter Daredevil, whose pursuit of justice has earned him the wrath of underworld leader Kingpin (Michael Clarke Duncan). Kingpin wants Daredevil out of his way once and for all, and hires Bullseye (Colin Farrell), a super-assassin with an uncanny ability to throw blades, to do the job. Daredevil also makes the acquaintance of Elektra Natchios (Jennifer Garner), a woman with super-heroic talents who is also on Kingpin's bad side, though it remains to be seen if she has aligned herself with the forces of good as Daredevil has done. Jon Favreau, Joe Pantoliano, and David Keith highlight Daredevil's supporting cast(n)

programme.title: Futurama
programme.desc: A Fishful of Dollars. Fry has a dream with a commercial in it, and everyone develops a strange urge to go shopping. Bender gets arrested for shoplifting, but the crew doesn't have enough money to bail him out of jail. Fry decides to look up his old bank account, which has since accrued billions of dollars in interest over the last thousand years. He spends his money frivolously and goes to a 20th century-style auction. He bids on a can of extinct anchovies and wins over the corporate tycoon Mom (voice of Tress MacNeille), known as "the world's most huggable industrialist." Needing the anchovy oil to run her robot oil business, Mom comes up with a scam to rob Fry by making him think it's really the year 2000. Pamela Anderson guest stars(n)

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: Free to Murder Again. The Texas penal system wakes up from a nightmare in the A&E program American Justice: Free to Murder Again. The subject of the documentary is serial killer Kenneth McDuff, the biggest mistake the parole board ever made. McDuff was first sentenced to death in 1968 for killing three teenagers. Seemingly, his incarceration meant the end of his murder spree. But due to the overcrowding of Texas jails, McDuff was eventually released after serving only 21 years. Soon, the criminal was back on the streets harassing children and adults alike. In 1991, McDuff abducted and killed a young woman only to repeat the pattern two years later with a pregnant mother of two. When he was captured and resentenced to death, his murderous trail was reported to include a handful of others. McDuff's situation alerted the government to the failures of the parole boards. His case eventually resulted in a slew of new prison constructions and tough law reforms(n)

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Two New Yorkers fight the battle of the sexes to a standstill (without entirely realizing it) in this romantic comedy. Andie (Kate Hudson) is a young journalist who longs to cover political stories, but in the meantime she finds herself writing for a women's magazine called Composure, where her editor Lana Jong (Bebe Neuwirth) has her writing a fluffy advice column. After hearing of the latest dating laments of her relationship-challenged friend Michelle (Kathryn Hahn), Andie sells Lana on the idea of writing a piece on the things women do to alienate the men they love, which she'll demonstrate by winning and then driving away a man in a mere ten days. Meanwhile, Ben (Matthew McConaughey) is an advertising man who wants to land a prestige diamond account at his firm. Ben is competing with his pals, Spears (Michael Michele) and Green (Shalom Harlow), for the assignment, so Ben tells his boss Phillip Warren (Robert Klein) that he's the man for the job because he understands the fair sex so well he can make any woman fall for him in less than two weeks. As fate would have it, Andie and Ben end up choosing one another for their mutual assignments, with neither knowing about each other's secret agenda as Ben strives to hold on to Andie while she does everything in her power to annoy him. How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days was loosely based on the self-help book of the same name (subtitled The Universal Don't of Dating) written by Michele Alexander and Jeannie Long(n)

programme.desc: Kevin takes a job as a barman but goes too far when he starts dispensing advice to his customers - whether they want it or not. Comedy, starring Kevin James.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam tries to be a horror writer, but his efforts get him grounded on Halloween when Beverly discovers that she is the basis for the monster in his story.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.sub-title: Recipe for Death II: Kiss the Cook.
programme.desc: Adam makes an action movie, but an unlikely replacement steps in when Barry goes missing for playing the lead. Comedy, starring Sean Giambrone, Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The doubles-version of the culinary challenge series heads to North Devon, where busy parents Matt and Sarah are the first hosts, but their decision to serve crisps as canapes does not go down well with some of their rivals. Next up are competitive `foodies' James and Laura, who put together a similar menu to their predecessors - but with more flair. The final party is thrown by am-dram couple Jake and Ian, and their guests' have high expectations that the pair's mushroom bruschetta starter and casserole main look set to miss.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from Leeds compete to host the best dinner party, beginning with construction manager Martin and his wife Amanda, who are determined to win. They are rivalled by competitive engaged couple Amy and Nico who impress with their entertainment and Hannah and Nick, who try to prove their doubters wrong by cooking duck to order.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel feels the pressure to be in a relationship when her last single friend gets engaged, and decides to go on a date with a man who is dull - but Joe teases her about finding someone more interesting. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel begins a relationship with a younger man, while Lennox faces a challenge from one of her classmates when she takes up the post of editor of the school blog. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel's new boyfriend George throws a party so that she can meet his friends, while Joe confronts his ex-wife after she takes her date to a location that was significant in their relationship. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel contemplates the future of her relationship as George is offered an amazing new job abroad, while Ryder's relationship is also becoming more serious as he meets Holly's parents. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel's father returns to the town to lobby for a bill that his daughter is strongly opposed to. Elsewhere, some of Lennox's poems catch the attention of a popular classmate who wants to become a singer. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake and Rosa learn there is more to Lt Hawkins' team than meets the eye as they continue searching for the bank robbers. Gina Gershon and Ryan Phillippe guest star.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam gets between Murray and Marvin when they go without him to the Philadelphia Thanksgiving Day parade to see KITT from TV show Knight Rider. Beverly invites Lainey and Bill to Thanksgiving dinner so that Barry won't split his time between two households, but her plans soon go awry. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry makes fun of Adam for taking part in a school musical production, but when he finds out that Adam and Lainey have been cast in roles that require them to kiss, he tries to sabotage it by joining the stage crew. Meanwhile, substitute teacher Beverly causes chaos in Erica's class. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: When Adam creates a video that makes it look as though he and his friends beat Barry in a game of basketball, the `loser' demands a re-match in the school gym.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: After finding out there is only going to be one Hanukkah song in the holiday pageant, Beverly convinces Erica to create the perfect song.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry attempts to prove Beverly wrong in his chemistry class, while Adam needs Erica's advice for his friendship with Emmy. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos, including a man pretending to be a walrus, an incredible downhill bike run and some computer keyboard hurling.(n)

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
programme.desc: The singing trio are left in the care of their manager's nephew and try to save a school's music programme by winning a battle-of-the-bands competition. However, they encounter fierce rivalry from another group of musical rodents. Comedy, starring Zachary Levi, Jason Lee and David Cross, with the voices of Justin Long and Christina Applegate.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is fired for being disrespectful to his boss, and explores new activities in a bid to find a purpose in life other than physics, but Leonard takes drastic action to restore him to his old self. Laurie Metcalf guest stars as Sheldon's mother.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard fears he is wasting his time with Penny and ends up spending the night with fellow scientist Leslie. However, he is disappointed when she later tells him she was only interested in a one-night stand. Meanwhile, Sheldon frets over a change to his hamburger routine. Starring Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco and Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny hosts a Halloween costume party, which proves a worthy test for the boys' social skills. During the event, Leonard has a run-in with Penny's ex-boyfriend. Kaley Cuoco, Johnny Galecki and Simon Helberg star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny is forced to take Howard's place in the boys' video-game night while he is otherwise engaged with one of her promiscuous friends. Simon Helberg, Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj's parents set him up on a blind date in the hope of initiating an arranged marriage, but after a promising start it becomes apparent that the girl in question is more interested in Sheldon. Meanwhile, Penny begins her new job as a bartender. Starring Kunal Nayyar and Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon receive an invitation to present their research to a physics conference, but Sheldon's reluctance to pander to his peers causes conflict between the friends. An intervention by Penny makes matters worse. Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Leonard invent excuses to avoid having to attend Penny's performance in a production of the stage musical Rent, but maintaining the pretence makes matters increasingly complicated. Johnny Galecki, Simon Helberg and Kaley Cuoco star, with DJ Qualls.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon falls ill, and his friends decide to go to a Planet of the Apes movie marathon to keep their distance, knowing he will be in a terrible mood. However, an unsuspecting Penny offers to nurse him. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Simon Helberg and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon feels threatened by a 15-year-old physics prodigy who is even cleverer than he is, and asks Leonard to help him discredit the precocious teenager's research. Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons star.(n)

programme.title: Easy A
programme.desc: A misfit teenage girl lies about her non-existent sexual history, and soon becomes the talk of the school. While she endures the harassment of conservative classmates, she grows to love the attention and sets out to create yet more rumours - but is unprepared when things get out of hand. Teen comedy, starring Emma Stone, Penn Badgley and Amanda Bynes.(n)

programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, including Bigheads, Britain's Got Talent, Line of Duty, Little Boy Blue, Joanna Lumley's Postcards, The Island with Bear Grylls and the News.(n)

programme.title: E:60 Pictures
programme.desc: Lettermen. The story of football players at Helen Bernstein High near Hollywood, Cal., where Dragons coach Masaki Matsumoto has parents write inspirational letters to their sons(n)

programme.title: E:60 Pictures
programme.desc: Life as Matt. A documentary looking at a year in the life of transgender high school track and field sprinter Matt Dawkins(n)

programme.title: E:60 Pictures
programme.desc: Owen & Haatchi. Featured: the relationship between Owen Howkins, an English boy with a rare muscular condition, and a three-legged companion dog named Haatchi. Tom Rinaldi reports(n)

programme.title: E:60 Pictures
programme.sub-title: What Lies Beneath: The Mick Fanning Story
programme.desc: What Lies Beneath: The Mick Fanning Story. Profiling three-time world-champion surfer Mick Fanning, with a look at his triumphant return from a 2015 shark attack in South Africa, plus family tragedy he endured on his rise to prominence. Narrated by actor and surfing enthusiast Chris Hemsworth, with insight from fellow surfers including Joel Parkinson(n)

programme.title: E:60
programme.desc: Friday Night Lies. An expanded report on Rush Propst, a once-revered Hoover (Ala.) High School football coach who was discovered to be leading a double life—with two wives and two families in the same town(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.desc: Arthur. Included: a dog's remarkable attachment to an adventure-racing team from Sweden during a race in South America(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Born in the Wild
programme.desc: Joy Reidenberg heads to New Zealand to uncover the mating strategy of dusky dolphins, and shows how marine mammals such as the harbour porpoise have evolved to reproduce in the ocean. Mark Evans visits Mexico to find out why whales travel 12,000 miles to find partners and how calves avoid ruthless predators underwater. The programme also witnesses the birth of a dolphin and reveals why they are born tail first.(n)

programme.title: Monster Bug Wars
programme.desc: A baby scorpion takes on a pirate spider, a comb-footed spider battles a spitting spider, and a lichen bark mantis fights a rock spider.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Babies
programme.desc: A look at the ways in which animals cope with new encounters that can shape their lives, especially in the early stages of development. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: David Attenborough observes the wildlife of the desert-like west and south of the island, an area where dry spells can last months and survival is a struggle. Verreaux's sifakas live among trees with potentially lethal spikes, while the baobab trees house mouse lemurs, primates that feed on the droppings of fluffy bugs. During the toughest time of year, gangs of ring-tailed lemurs try to raise their young, and as the rains arrive, the year-long life cycle of the Labord's chameleon begins.(n)

programme.title: Galapagos
programme.desc: An insight into how creatures adapt to the islands' extremes of weather, including iguanas that climb more than 1,000 metres to lay eggs, fish forced to rely on the shade provided by mangroves, and seals that survive on exposed shorelines by taking shelter in lava grottos. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Outback Rangers
programme.desc: The team helps after a road accident and a saltwater crocodile is found dead. Following the lives of armed rangers at Kakadu National Park in the Northern Territory, Australia.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.sub-title: To the Ends of the Earth.
programme.desc: David Attenborough travels to the Arctic and Antarctic to explore the wildernesses at Earth's poles, investigating the wildlife and geographical features found there. He begins by travelling to the North Pole, where two polar bears reveal a surprisingly tender side to their characters, before heading to the South Pole - 100 years after Roald Amundsen and Robert Falcon Scott first reached it.(n)

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: A polar bear hunts with her cubs, while the warmer weather of spring accelerates a process that will eventually see an area of ice the size of Australia disappear into the Arctic Ocean. A woolly bear caterpillar emerges from the snow after spending the winter frozen, and in Antarctica male Adelie penguins arrive to begin constructing nests in fierce storms as they try to attract mates.(n)

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: How animals in the polar regions adapt to the summer weather. In a colony of 400,000 king penguins the adults go surfing and the chicks take mud-baths to cool off, while polar bear cubs take their first swimming lessons as the ice they inhabit melts away. A minke whale is hunted by a family of killer whales, succumbing to their battering after two hours, and Adelie penguins try to prevent their chicks being snatched by skuas.(n)

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: With the arrival of autumn the Arctic Ocean begins freezing over, and polar bears gather in large numbers on the coast as they await the return of the ice. Two thousand beluga whales head for a particular estuary to thrash against the gravel and exfoliate, while in Antarctica, Adelie penguins take to the sea for the first time and face the danger of leopard seal attacks.(n)

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: David Attenborough examines how the arrival of winter sparks a ruthless battle for survival in the polar regions, with temperatures plummeting to -70C, winds reaching 120mph and day-long darkness. As a blizzard rages, a polar bear treks into the Arctic mountains to give birth, while the entire world population of spectacled eider braves the weather in a giant ice hole. Wolves and bison engage in battle, but alliances are also made, and beneath the snow, voles try to dodge the attacks of great grey owls and weasels.(n)

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: David Attenborough explores the life and work of people in the polar regions, including the residents of Norilsk in Siberia, the coldest city on Earth. He also discovers how the Danish armed forces maintain their country's claim to Greenland's natural resources by mounting a 2,000-mile dog sled patrol during the winter, and finds out how a research base at the South Pole is able to cope with being cut off from the outside world for six months at a time.(n)

programme.title: The Good Son
programme.desc: After his mother's death, a young boy, Mark, is left with his aunt and uncle while his father makes an important trip. Cousin Henry is at first great fun, but isn't your average boy next door. Mark believes Henry is evil, but no one else can see this(n)

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence stars in this slam-dunk of a family-friendly sports fable as a self-absorbed college basketball coach whose public meltdown forces him to seek redemption by mentoring a team of junior-high misfits. Wendy Raquel Robinson, Horatio Sanz, Breckin Meyer, Patrick Warburton, Megan Mullally, Oren Williams, Eddy Martin, Tara Correa(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, a young Apatosaurus is swept away by a vicious river current and ends up far from home. He soon embarks on a journey to reunite with his family, and befriends a prehistoric human child along the way(n)

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens mistake images of 1980s arcade games as a sign of aggression, they attack Earth with evil versions of Pac-Man, Donkey Kong and other video-game characters. In response, the U.S. president asks his old gamer pals to battle the invaders(n)

programme.title: Major League
programme.desc: A rollicking, irreverent baseball comedy that follows the fortunes of a misfit team of bungling amateurs and over-the- hill athletes and how they and their fans react when they find themselves in the middle of a totally unexpected winning streak(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: A haunting tale of a widow with psychic powers who gets involved in a murder mystery(n)

programme.title: Revenge of the Pink Panther
programme.desc: The last Pink Panther film to star Peter Sellers before his untimely death. French mobster Philippe Douvier, suffering from a lack of respect in the crime community, orders the murder of Chief Inspector Clouseau, who has been hailed as a genius. After the assassination attempt, a dead body is found in Clouseau's car and everyone - including Clouseau's former superior, Charles Dreyfus - believes Clouseau is dead. Feeling much better, Dreyfus is released from the mental hospital that Clouseau drove him to in the first place. But Clouseau is not dead and goes undercover together with his trusty manservant Cato to discover who tried to kill him(n)

programme.title: Let's Go to Prison
programme.desc: A habitual thief takes revenge on the judge who continually jails him, by framing his son and having him sent to the same prison as him(n)

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens mistake images of 1980s arcade games as a sign of aggression, they attack Earth with evil versions of Pac-Man, Donkey Kong and other video-game characters. In response, the U.S. president asks his old gamer pals to battle the invaders(n)

programme.title: A Simple Plan
programme.desc: Thriller about three men who find millions of dollars in the wreck of a single-engine plane buried in the deep snow of a Minnesota winter. Deciding to see whether the money is missed come the spring thaw - when the plane will be found - they try to sit on their secret without arousing the suspicions of family and neighbours or cracking under the unexpected pressures that gradually accrue(n)

programme.title: Major League
programme.desc: A rollicking, irreverent baseball comedy that follows the fortunes of a misfit team of bungling amateurs and over-the- hill athletes and how they and their fans react when they find themselves in the middle of a totally unexpected winning streak(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Time's Up. Angela and the feds push Tommy to flip on Lobos or spend his life in prison, while Ghost considers doing the honorable thing, but the consequences could prove steep(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Ghost Is Dead. In the Season 2 finale, members of Ghost's organization are turning up dead, and each body hits closer to home for him and Tommy as the threat of Kanan and Angela's investigation becomes more imminent(n)

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby co-stars Will Ferrell and John C. Reilly re-team with that film's director, Adam McKay, to tell the tale of two pampered best friends whose single parents fall in love and decide to marry. McKay and Ferrell share screenwriting credits, and Judd Apatow and Jimmy Miller produce(n)

programme.title: Patton
programme.desc: A profile of military genius General George S Patton and chronicles his World War II campaigns on the European front and in North Africa, and his push into Germany(n)

programme.title: Death Proof
programme.desc: Two women are stalked by a killer who uses his 'death proof' cars to execute his murderous plans(n)

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Sequel in which a great white shark returns to terrorise a teen sailing regatta as the town of Amity tries to recover from the previous attacks(n)

programme.title: A Simple Plan
programme.desc: Thriller about three men who find millions of dollars in the wreck of a single-engine plane buried in the deep snow of a Minnesota winter. Deciding to see whether the money is missed come the spring thaw - when the plane will be found - they try to sit on their secret without arousing the suspicions of family and neighbours or cracking under the unexpected pressures that gradually accrue(n)

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: Rousing continuation of the pugilistic saga, in which the legendary boxer is set against the might of a one-man Soviet fighting machine who has caused the death of Rocky's best friend. In doing so, Rocky becomes a bombastic American icon, as he takes the fight and Uncle Sam's best wishes to the heart of Russia, dealing out his own particular brand of justice(n)

programme.title: A Simple Plan
programme.desc: Thriller about three men who find millions of dollars in the wreck of a single-engine plane buried in the deep snow of a Minnesota winter. Deciding to see whether the money is missed come the spring thaw - when the plane will be found - they try to sit on their secret without arousing the suspicions of family and neighbours or cracking under the unexpected pressures that gradually accrue(n)

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: While out on a call, Roy Neary, a power repairman, witnesses' unidentified flying objects in the skies near his Muncie, Indiana home. This encounter sets into action a startling chain of dramatic events. Neary tries desperately to understand what he has experienced. He is baffled by the governmental cover-up that blocks his efforts, however, and finds himself increasingly driven to the emotional edge(n)

programme.title: Me, Myself & Irene
programme.desc: A Rhode Island state trooper (Jim Carrey) with a split personality tries to protect a lovely con artist (Renee Zellweger) from foul play in this hilarious film by the Farrelly brothers. The situation becomes even more complicated when each of the officer's personalities begins to fall for the young woman. Chris Cooper, Anthony Anderson, Mongo Brownlee, Jerod Mixon(n)

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Sequel in which a great white shark returns to terrorise a teen sailing regatta as the town of Amity tries to recover from the previous attacks(n)

Reilly re-team with that film's director, Adam McKay, to tell the tale of two pampered best friends whose single parents fall in love and decide to marry. McKay and Ferrell share screenwriting credits, and Judd Apatow and Jimmy Miller produce(n)

programme.title: Navy SEALs
programme.desc: While rescuing an American air crew captured by Mid-Eastern terrorists, Lieutenant Curran and his team of Navy Seals discover evidence that the terrorists have come into possession of dangerous high-tech weapons(n)

programme.title: Fist of Fury
programme.desc: Ancient rivalries come to the fore as students from a Japanese school of martial arts wage war on a rival Chinese dojo. The conflict takes a more serious turn when one of the fighters is killed, prompting a martial arts expert to seek vengeance on the murderers in a final do-or-die battle(n)

programme.title: Grindhouse
programme.desc: In a throwback to 1970s exploitation films and drive-in double features, directors Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez serve up a chilling two-fer with "Death Proof" and "Planet Terror." The first is about a killer car; the second's a zombie flick. In the opener, Kurt Russell plays a stuntman wreaking havoc with his wheels of death. Then, survivors of a bio-weapon mishap battle an army of killer zombies. Rose McGowan has roles in both. Tarantino and Rodriguez also scripted their films(n)

programme.title: The Great Train Robbery
programme.desc: An accomplished gentleman crook and a master safecracker hatch a plan to rob a British Army payroll train carrying a fortune in gold bullion, destined for the troops fighting in the Crimea(n)

programme.title: Pineapple Express
programme.desc: Critically acclaimed director David Gordon Green takes a break from the brooding drama that defined such early efforts as George Washington and Undertow for this action-flavored buddy comedy concerning two pot-smoking friends (Seth Rogen and James Franco) who unwittingly become involved with a vicious gang of drug dealers. Judd Apatow and Shauna Robertson produce a script co-penned by star Rogen and Evan Goldberg(n)

programme.title: The Touch
programme.desc: Peter Pau, the oscar winning cinematographer of Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, directed Tian Mai Chuanqi (The Touch). Pak Yin-fay (Michelle Yeoh) and Pak Yeuk-tong (Brandon Chang) are siblings in a family of acrobats. Bad guy Karl (Richard Roxburgh) employs gifted thief/acrobat Eric (Ben Chaplain) to steal an item created in the 1200s. Eric is successful, but the fact that he is Yin-fay's adopted brother makes his motivations less than clear. While everyone attempts to possess the item, it is Yeuk-tong who ends up with it. He and his girlfriend take off with the object, with all of the other characters in pursuit(n)

programme.title: 5 Days of War
programme.desc: An American journalist, his cameraman and a Georgian native become caught in the crossfire during the war between Russia and Georgia(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: When a gigantic great white shark begins to menace the small island community of Amity, a police chief, a marine scientist and grizzled fisherman set out to stop it(n)

programme.desc: Critically acclaimed director David Gordon Green takes a break from the brooding drama that defined such early efforts as George Washington and Undertow for this action-flavored buddy comedy concerning two pot-smoking friends (Seth Rogen and James Franco) who unwittingly become involved with a vicious gang of drug dealers. programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: A wild and star-studded parody of 'Star Wars', in which the fair Princess Vespa must be rescued from the malevolent clutches of arch-villain Lord Dark Helmet, giving rise to a series of heroic escapades(n)

programme.title: Wild Bill
programme.desc: This film is the tale of how Wild Bill Hickok finally got his in Deadwood, but director Walter Hill tells the story in an unapologetically realistic fashion, laying to waste the glamourous legend of Wild Bill. Hill presents to the audience a stubborn, half-blind, drug-addicted Hickok who is harder to like. Terrific performances from everyone on board, especially David Arquette who is a standout(n)

programme.desc: When a gigantic great white shark begins to menace the small island community of Amity, a police chief, a marine scientist and grizzled fisherman set out to stop it(n)

programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: A wild and star-studded parody of 'Star Wars', in which the fair Princess Vespa must be rescued from the malevolent clutches of arch-villain Lord Dark Helmet, giving rise to a series of heroic escapades(n)

programme.title: Bats
programme.desc: Beware of what goes "bump" (and "squeak" and "flap flap flap") in the night. Dr. Sheila Casper (Dina Meyer) is a respected zoologist dispatched by the government to Gallup, TX, a small community suffering from an unusual number of reported bat attacks. Casper finds this news puzzling, since bats are generally placid creatures who avoid contact with humans. The local sheriff, Emmett Kimsey (Lou Diamond Phillips), assures Casper that the reports are on the level and that something needs to be done about swarms of aggressive bats so thick they blot out the moon. Caspar and Kimsey discover that a new breed of genetically altered bats have escaped from a research facility and taken up residence in a cave near Gallup -- but the nocturnal bloodsuckers have no intention of leaving as quickly as they arrived. Bats was written by John Logan, who had two other projects hit the screen within a few months of Bats' release: Oliver Stone's Any Given Sunday and Ridley Scott's Gladiator. The supporting cast includes Leon and Bob Gunton(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Ben Gates is off on another thrilling treasure hunt in this action-packed sequel involving a missing page from John Wilkes Booth's diary, which leads to a globe-trotting race to find an ancient city of gold(n)

programme.title: The Touch
programme.desc: Peter Pau, the oscar winning cinematographer of Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, directed Tian Mai Chuanqi (The Touch). Pak Yin-fay (Michelle Yeoh) and Pak Yeuk-tong (Brandon Chang) are siblings in a family of acrobats. Bad guy Karl (Richard Roxburgh) employs gifted thief/acrobat Eric (Ben Chaplain) to steal an item created in the 1200s. Eric is successful, but the fact that he is Yin-fay's adopted brother makes his motivations less than clear. While everyone attempts to possess the item, it is Yeuk-tong who ends up with it. He and his girlfriend take off with the object, with all of the other characters in pursuit(n)

programme.title: Wild Bill
programme.desc: This film is the tale of how Wild Bill Hickok finally got his in Deadwood, but director Walter Hill tells the story in an unapologetically realistic fashion, laying to waste the glamourous legend of Wild Bill. Hill presents to the audience a stubborn, half-blind, drug-addicted Hickok who is harder to like. Terrific performances from everyone on board, especially David Arquette who is a standout(n)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: Science fiction adventure in which a futuristic, militarised Earth is threatened by regiments of giant insects from outer space. When an idealistic teenager enlists in the army in order to become a citizen, he is put through a brutal training programme to prepare him for the horrors of war. Sent to the distant planet Klendaathu, he and his fellow troopers fight the deadly enemy force(n)

There, with the aid of his still-intact brilliant mind, Westlake refashions himself as the shadowy superhero Darkman(n)
