programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Three Pies.
programme.desc: Adrian's estranged brother Ambrose, an obsessive hoarder and agoraphobic, helps him investigate a typically bizarre murder involving a sack race, a bingo tournament and a cherry pie. Drama, guest starring John Turturro, with Tony Shalhoub.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane is forced to help his estranged brother-in-law, who has become embroiled in a murder investigation. Despite his reservations, the consultant joins the case, but is forced to face his dubious past and encounters a number of old acquaintances. Crime drama, guest starring Kevin Rankin (Bionic Woman), with Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A murder case leads Jane into conflict with charismatic cult leader Bret Stiles, whom he first met while investigating the death of a media mogul. The consultant is surprised when his antagonist offers him information regarding the identity of serial killer Red John, and the location of missing psychic Kristina Frye. Guest starring Malcolm McDowell (Heroes), with Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The gang takes on a grifter team running a sophisticated Sweetheart scam while looking for a philanthropist's missing wife. Meanwhile, Nate has to learn to open up to the mark - and to Sophie.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The tech-savvy crooks set up an elaborate treasure hunt in the hope of conning a brother and sister running a cash-for-gold scam. Drama about hi-tech crooks who use their skills to right corporate wrongs, battle injustice in the corridors of power and steal from wealthy criminals.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. First lieutenant Michael Torres gets involved in a fight before falling to the ground, and is found beaten to death the next morning. The only witness is his friend and colleague Captain Joe Westcott, who suffers from post-traumatic stress disorder and has trouble distinguishing reality from his past military experiences in the Middle East.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. Tony reviews satellite footage of rebel forces in the Middle East and spots Kersey among a group of insurgents, concluding that Joe Westcott's fear of him was well-founded. Back at HQ, Abby creates a 3D computer model of the attack that occurred in Afghanistan and Joe dons a virtual-reality headset to relive the traumatic events. Will it jog his memory?.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A man convicted of murder and rape is released from jail because of faulty DNA evidence and subsequently killed, prompting Jane and the team to investigate his death. However, it soon becomes apparent that more than one person wanted revenge on him. Guest starring Jack Coleman (Heroes), with Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The case of a murdered jockey leads Jane and the team into the murky underworld of horse racing, where they uncover a number of suspects. Crime drama, guest starring Jim Beaver (Deadwood) and Olesya Rulin (High School Musical), with Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: Nate engages in a battle of wits against his own father when Latimer hires legendary grifter Jimmy Ford to rip off a high-security government office. He and his team of con artists are also forced to engineer a fake stand-off - complete with hostages - when they are trapped inside the facility by their rival. Crime drama, guest starring Tom Skerritt.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: Nate and the team try to find a way to take down Latimer and his mysterious ally, and turn to old friends and enemies for help in preparing the ultimate con.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Teenager Lydia Wade manages to escape a gang of masked men trying to abduct her and her friend Rosie, the daughter of a US Navy commander. Lydia's Navy captain father David Wade was shot dead during the attack and her mother is overseas, so Ziva offers to look after the girl, while Abby tries to jog her memory by creating facial reconstructions of the attackers based on some grainy CCTV footage. DiNozzo and McGee find links on Rosie's laptop to possible suspect John `Diesel' Stevens.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs is called to the scene when there is an attempt on the life of FBI agent TC Fornell, with the assailant identified as Navy seaman Tyler Brown. The pair team up and visit the bar where Brown worked and bump into their mutual ex-wife Diane Sterling, who was operating undercover as an employee suspected of stealing customers' identities. Joe Spano and Melinda McGraw guest star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs, McGee and Torres travel to a remote area of Paraguay controlled by violent rebels, in search of a Navy Seal who disappeared during an unsanctioned trip. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: The Trial Analysis team heads to Miami with JP Nunnelly to work on a drug trafficking case in which both their clients and the jurors' lives are in jeopardy. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: I Never Met the Dead Man.
programme.desc: Peter unwittingly destroys the town's TV transmitter and persuades Meg to take the blame by promising to buy her a car. Meanwhile, Stewie tries to build a weather control device in a misguided bid to rid the world of broccoli.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Meg is thrilled to make a new friend, unaware she is a member of a suicide cult. Peter inadvertently cancels Lois's plans for Stewie's first birthday party and has to go to great lengths to make alternative arrangements.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine discovers Stan's love of figure-skating and decides to take it up so they can perform as a pair. However, his competitive nature leads him to look for a more able partner. Meanwhile, Steve's classmate brings his mail-order bride to school.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Power-hungry Roger and Steve set their sights on fame and fortune, and head to New York City. However, it does not take Roger long to lose everything on Wall Street, and Steve contemplates turning to prostitution. Meanwhile, the rest of the family is convinced that the runaways are only in the treehouse.(n)

programme.title: Rick and Morty
programme.desc: Rick goes to battle with the devil, but Summer is upset about it. Guest starring Alfred Molina, Nolan North and Rich Fulcher.(n)

programme.title: Rick and Morty
programme.sub-title: Close Rick-Counters of the Rick Kind.
programme.desc: Rick runs into some old associates, which results in a fall out with Morty.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve uses skills taught by his dad to save the Smiths when Stan ousts him from the family home and replaces him with the malicious Barry. Meanwhile, Roger proves he has what it takes to become a fraternity brother.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Haunting memories prompt Francine to woo George Clooney with the intention of breaking his heart. However, Stan actually falls for him and ruins her plan. Back at home, Roger sets up a sweatshop staffed by foster children.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois books a couple's vacation, but it turns out to be a marriage counselling programme. Carter is frustrated because the kids are so into their electronics, and tries to force them into playing the old-fashioned way.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter loses his job at the Happy-Go-Lucky toy factory, but the blow is cushioned by an unexpected windfall in the form of a massive welfare payout. First-ever episode of the animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein and Seth Green.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan becomes a drag racer in an effort to satisfy Francine's desire for more excitement in their marriage. Meanwhile, Hayley breaks up with Jeff - who deals with his heartache by immersing himself in the world of online gaming. Animated comedy about a CIA agent and his dysfunctional family.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan and Francine try for another baby, while Roger decides to enrol at the same college as Hayley in a bid to experience student life - but somehow ends up teaching a class. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Wendy Schaal.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team tries to track down wanted terrorist Harper Dearing before another US Navy ship is destroyed, and a desperate Gibbs enlists the aid of a prisoner to draw his target out of hiding. Meanwhile, Palmer is forced to consider putting his nuptials on hold as the stand-off with Dearing becomes heated. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The aftermath of Harper Dearing's bomb attack on the NCIS headquarters dominates proceedings. As rescue crews sift through the debris searching for survivors, Abby, Gibbs, McGee and Vance are accounted for, but Ziva and Tony are trapped in a lift. Dearing makes contact after his ex-wife is taken into custody, enabling his car to be traced to an abandoned lot - and the agents arrive just in time to see the vehicle blow up. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team investigate the death of an armoury employee when divers find her body in a car at the bottom of a lake. The victim had been reported missing since she was evacuated before the blast at NCIS headquarters. Meanwhile, crisis counsellor Miles Wolf carries out psychological assessments of all the agents in the wake of the bombings. Guest starring Steve Valentine (Crossing Jordan).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: While on medical leave, Ducky reopens a 12-year-old case by talking officials at a cemetery into releasing the body of a navy commander whose post-mortem he carried out 12 years previously. Meanwhile, the team is called in to investigate the death of a sergeant from carbon monoxide poisoning - and finds a copy of Ducky's exhumation request on the man's laptop. Crime drama, starring David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate when three dehydrated survivors from a helicopter crash are discovered. The pilot is initially missing, but his body later washes ashore with a gunshot wound to the head. Things get complicated when one of the crew members tells the agents the chopper was hit by another aircraft, while another states that the pilot tried to kill them all by crashing into the sea on purpose. American drama, starring Mark Harmon and David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Delilah is rushed to hospital when the stress of planning her wedding becomes too much for her. Meanwhile, the team investigates the unexplained death of a healthy petty officer.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs, McGee and Torres travel to a remote area of Paraguay controlled by violent rebels, in search of a Navy Seal who disappeared during an unsanctioned trip. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: The Trial Analysis team heads to Miami with JP Nunnelly to work on a drug trafficking case in which both their clients and the jurors' lives are in jeopardy. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The agents suspect a hitman is responsible for the recent murder of an Assistant District Attorney, leading Van Pelt to pose as a potential client to meet him. The killer is arrested and taken to court, but Jane's unorthodox methods cause the trial to fall apart. Suspended from duty, he takes matters into his own hands and discovers who hired the murderer, but puts his and Lisbon's lives in danger. Crime drama, starring Amanda Righetti and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane finds a new adversary in cult leader Bret Stiles, who arouses suspicion when a media mogul who may have questioned his group's activities is found dead. As the team searches for clues, the victim's father receives an anonymous text message warning that a bomb is about to detonate in the building. Crime drama, guest starring Malcolm McDowell (A Clockwork Orange).(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A mathematical genius is shot dead and found with his index finger removed. The agents discover he was working on a code-breaking device that could make it possible to hack into any computer - but after finishing it had refused to pass the instrument over to the buyer. When Jane learns another whizz kid knows the whereabouts of the tool, he faces a race against time to stop it falling into the wrong hands. Crime drama, guest starring Lucy Davis (The Office) and Fisher Stevens (Lost).(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The leader of an organisation dedicated to eradicating human trafficking is killed before making an important speech, leading the agents to suspect the killer was desperate to stop the presentation. Self-proclaimed psychic Kristina Frye joins the team to help with the investigation, and soon discovers the victim was going to expose a shocking truth about his own association. Guest starring Leslie Hope (24) and Eugene Byrd (Heroes), with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Police believe a college student was the latest victim of Red John, prompting Kristina Frye to make a televised appeal for the elusive murderer to come forward. Remembering how his own TV appearance led to the death of his family, a furious Jane tries to protect the self-proclaimed psychic - only to discover the serial killer may be one step ahead of him. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker, with Leslie Hope (24).(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.sub-title: The Devil Wears a Lapel Pin.
programme.desc: Stan is enlisted to organise the CIA calendar, but Hayley sets out to destroy it. Elsewhere, Roger fakes his own death to avoid paying a huge balance on a credit card.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: A mishap at home with charity drive chocolates lands Steve in trouble at school, and he is placed in the `At-Risk' class with the student body's worst trouble-makers.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger runs off in disguise as a Julia Roberts character to a small town after Stan hurts his feelings. Steve plans a meeting when he finds out that Jeff and Barry have never met.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Quagmire is reunited with a former lover when the guys travel to South Korea to retrieve the final episode of a soap he starred in while he was in the army. Stewie is concerned that he will become a redhead.(n)

programme.desc: Stewie impregnates himself with Brian's DNA to save their friendship, while Peter and the guys try to make a viral video.(n)

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: Brad Pitt stars as an ex-United Nations employee racing around the globe in a bid to halt a worldwide zombie pandemic in Marc Forster's sprawling adaptation of Max Brooks' bestselling novel of the same name. Retired U.N. investigator Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) and his family are sitting in what appears to be a typical Philadelphia traffic jam when helicopters began to circle ominously overhead, and an explosion throws the city into panic. In the blink of an eye, the streets are consumed by chaos. When Gerry learns that the catalyst for the turmoil is a highly contagious virus that transforms those who contract it into rampaging maniacs, and that legions of the infected are growing on all continents, he agrees to join his former colleagues in discovering the source of the rampant plague so that his wife and two daughters will be guaranteed safety aboard a UN fleet in the Atlantic Ocean. Upon tracing a crucial e-mail to a U.S. military base in South Korea, Gerry learns that the infection has spread more rapidly than anyone realizes. Although a subsequent trip to Jerusalem, where the government has constructed a massive wall to keep the public safe, initially offers hope that the growing horde can be kept at bay, an unexpected breach sends Gerry back into the sky in search of patient zero. Just when Gerry thinks he's traced the origins of the virus, however, the unthinkable happens. Subsequently stranded in Cardiff with a fearless Israeli soldier, Gerry quickly makes his way to a World Health Organization outpost where the few remaining scientists have hit a dead end in their search for a cure. But the struggle is far from over, and after recalling an unusual scene witnessed in Jerusalem, Gerry prepares to make a leap of faith that could prevent the downfall of humanity(n)

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic architect, frustrated in his job but determined to make a better life for his family, is bestowed with a powerful universal remote that allows him more control over his life than he ever knew possible in director Frank Coraci's high-concept fantasy comedy. On the surface, Michael Newman (Adam Sandler) seems to have it all, yet with all the demands forced upon him by his ungrateful boss (David Hasselhoff), Michael finds that setting aside time to spend with his loving wife, Donna (Kate Beckinsale), and two picture-perfect children, Ben (Joseph Castanon) and Samantha (Tatum McCann), has grown increasingly difficult. When a frustrating bout with the television remote leads the overworked husband and father to a nearby Bed, Bath & Beyond in search of a universal remote with the power to control all of his electronic devices, a curious peek into the back room leads Michael into the company of eccentric employee and talented inventor Morty (Christopher Walken). It seems that Morty has created a device that will not only allow Michael complete control over his television and stereo, but his entire life as well. As Michael discovers that the remarkable device has the power to muffle the barks of the family dog, zoom himself past an irritating quarrel with his wife, and even allow him to travel back and forth through time to different points in his life, the rush of being able to skip straight to the good parts in life soon leaves him feeling as if he's missing out on the total experience. Only when Michael begins to realize that the he has lost control of his life and the remote is now programming him does he finally learn that life is as much about the moments he'd rather forget as it is the moments he will always remember(n)

programme.title: That's My Boy

Second World War melodrama which is all the more effective thanks to the straightforward nature of the plot and action. programme.title: The Blue Dahlia

Not only must he deal with the news of his wife's infidelities, but he also finds himself accused of her murder. However, the wife of his dead spouse's lover is on hand to help him prove his innocence. Thriller, written by Raymond Chandler and starring Alan Ladd, Veronica Lake, William Bendix and Doris Dowling.(n)

programme.title: Crash Dive
programme.desc: On the eve of departing for a dangerous mission, a submariner falls for a schoolteacher, unaware she is the sweetheart of his commanding officer. On board, the two men eventually discover they are romantic rivals, but form a close bond as they concentrate on their duty and the task of destroying enemy U-boats. Romantic wartime drama, starring Tyrone Power, Dana Andrews, Anne Baxter, May Whitty and Harry Morgan.(n)

programme.title: Gideon of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: Police inspector George Gideon experiences an eventful day's work. He learns one of his detectives has accepted bribes, goes on the trail of a murderous maniac and tracks a woman suspected of robbery. He also helps foil a bank heist and gets off on the wrong foot with an eager young constable. John Ford's drama, starring Jack Hawkins, Dianne Foster, Anna Lee and Anna Massey.(n)

programme.title: Ride Along
programme.desc: A wannabe police officer persuades his girlfriend's tough detective brother to take him along on duty. Comedy, starring Ice Cube, Kevin Hart and Laurence Fishburne.(n)

programme.title: Red 2
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his squad of retired operatives for a vital mission. A devastatingly powerful new weapon has been stolen, and it falls to Frank's team to retrieve it - which means facing lethal assassins, terrorists and corrupt government officials out to steal the device. Action thriller sequel, starring Bruce Willis, Helen Mirren and John Malkovich.(n)

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: New York cop John McClane visits Los Angeles to see his family over the Christmas holiday. Action thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman and Bonnie Bedelia.(n)

Martial arts adventure, starring Gordon Liu.(n)

While the horrified father struggles to cope with a world of teachers and school bullies, the youngster is revelling in the perks of being a grown-up. programme.desc: Tia Mowry shares her menu for Thanksgiving, including a herbes de Provence turkey, cornbread stuffing with sausage, apple and fennel, and brown-butter green beans.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Chef Jamie Oliver prepares simple recipes using tomatoes and demonstrates how even the tiniest balcony or backyard can be used to grow fruit and vegetables. He also creates an oven-baked sausage ragu and seasonal salad, before mixing up a pale pink tomato and vodka consomme.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver creates a selection of dishes with the bumper crop of courgettes he has grown in his garden, including a salad and a recipe that involves deep-frying and stuffing the edible flowers. He also shows how the vegetable can be served as an accompaniment to grilled mackerel.(n)

programme.title: Paul Hollywood: City Bakes
programme.desc: In Iceland's capital city, Paul bakes using volcanic geothermal energy, meets food writer Eva Laufey, and creates two of his own bakes inspired by Icelandic cuisine.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: It's a Drummond sleepover at the lodge and Ree's making a finger food feast of crispy chicken strips, sweet potato fries, honey mustard dip and fruit pizzas.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond's investment club is gathering for the first time in 10 years. Her Mexican-inspired menu has fabulous blackberry margaritas to get the party started.(n)

programme.title: Country Show Cook Off
programme.desc: Aldo Zilli and Silvena Rowe embark on the second day of their culinary road trip. They reach Trawden in Lancashire and pull up beside the ruins of Wycoller Hall with one of their prize cheesecakes to compete in a garden show against some of the best local bakers. Along the way, they catch up with butcher Joseph Mellin to sample a delicacy.(n)

programme.title: Country Show Cook Off
programme.desc: Aldo Zilli and Silvena Rowe travel to Kirkby Lonsdale, Cumbria, where they enter the `dessert in a wine glass' category at the Lunesdale Country Show. They also meet gamekeeper Richard Wolfenden, who attends to the red grouse on Fourstones Moor, and he provides them with the luxury ingredient of freshly caught game.(n)

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: The six remaining bakers get creative as they invent lunchbox desserts.(n)

programme.title: Paul Hollywood: City Bakes
programme.desc: Paul visits San Francisco, home to one of America's most iconic bakes, the sourdough, where he creates savoury bread and butter pudding, and cheese and olive bread.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver provides tips on hosting a barbecue and demonstrates simple rules that guarantee properly cooked food every time. He also shows the best ways to cook everything on the grill, including chicken, ribs and shellfish, before revealing his recipe for the perfect marinade.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Chef Jamie Oliver cooks three dishes to show the versatility of beans, using legumes he picked from his garden - home-made baked borlotti beans, a hearty runner bean stew and a marinated French bean salad.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy visits an underground joint in Syracuse, New York, serving up chicken caesar sandwiches and spicy, sweet sausage fajitas.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy visits Southern-inspired Brooklyn, New York, to sample fried chicken and waffles, a spicy pulled pork sandwich and a daily doughnut.(n)

programme.title: Jamie and Jimmy's Friday Night Feast
programme.desc: Actor Michael Sheen returns to his Welsh roots as he prepares lamb cawl, Jamie Oliver impresses the diners with pork belly and beef brisket chilli, and Jimmy Doherty builds a DIY oven to produce crispy Peking duck. The boys also head to the beach for a look at Southend's fishing industry.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant Stakeout
programme.desc: Owner of Nauna's Bella Casa restaurant asks for help to figure out what his staff are doing when he is not around that is costing him valuable customers.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: The owner of Buster's Beach House in Long Beach calls Charles to investigate rumours that his executive chef is showing preferential treatment among the waiting staff.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: The owner of Falls Taproom in Philadelphia contacts Charles to help investigate a feud between his girlfriend and his best friend, who are manager and customer respectively.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri continues his journey visiting America's most interesting restaurants, stopping in Portland to try a barbecue restaurant that smokes trout and lamb ribs.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: A restaurant in Okarche, Oklahoma, that specialises in fried chicken and has been serving it the same way for more than 40 years.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Chef Robert Irvine may have met his match with the owner of Mom and Dad's, as he tries to save it from failure in just two days and with a budget of only $10,000.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: The owner of The Anchor Bar and Tattoo, Atlanta notices a drop in food and tattoo sales, so the Mystery Diners go undercover to see if the two problems are related.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: The team helps the owners of Star Cafe and Star Coaches in Atlanta, who are concerned about missing food in their kitchen and a rise in fuel expenses on their tour buses.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa - Back to Basics
programme.desc: The American chef is joined by Michael Symon and the duo prepare a Greek menu including smoked pork ribs, tzatziki and spicy houmous.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa - Back to Basics
programme.desc: Ina Garten prepares a chocolate-themed menu including cupcakes with a peanut butter frosting, chocolate gelato, a chocolate orange fondue and white chocolate truffles.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa - Back to Basics
programme.desc: Ina Garten demonstrates the ultimate guide to grilling including Tuscan lemon chicken, and Indonesian grilled swordfish.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa - Back to Basics
programme.desc: American chef and cookbook writer Ina Garten hosts a fundraiser and shares her tips for a foolproof cocktail party.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: It's fires on the ranch and flames in the kitchen as Ree Drummond prepares dinner for the family, including several grilled favourites in a mouth-watering feast.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond demonstrates how to make a tex-mex themed celebration lunch, including recipes for chipotle chicken chili, chili cheese muffins, caramel brownies and Mexican punch.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond demonstrates how to make croissant French toast with maple whipped cream, grilled chicken and strawberry salad wrap, and pawhuska cheese-steaks.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond demonstrates how to make takeout treats, including Chinese food, such as cream cheese won tons, sticky orange chicken, beef with broccoli and stir-fried chow mein.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver prepares dishes using strawberries grown in hanging baskets at his Essex plot. He uses the fruit to create a salad with speck and halloumi, rustles up a home-made jam to serve with a creamy rice pudding and presents his take on an old classic - grilled strawberries with Pimm's.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: The chef prepares a selection of dishes using fresh peas and broad beans from his garden and demonstrates not only how easy they are to grow but also the bumper yield that can be achieved. He uses the vegetables as the final touches in a spaghetti and meatball dish, as well as creating `posh beans on toast' and a spicy fritter.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver prepares dishes using homegrown brassicas - a vegetable group that includes cauliflower, broccoli, curly kale and kohlrabi. The chef is surprised to discover how many of these plants can be eaten raw, but it does not stop him using them to prepare curried fritters and a hearty cannelloni.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: The chef explains the value of pickling and preserving home-grown produce and explains why knowledge of these processes has been of vital importance throughout history. He goes on to demonstrate the procedure by pickling courgettes with mint and chilli, as well as aubergines with garlic and oregano.(n)

programme.title: The Piglet Files
programme.desc: Peter ends up babysitting a thief when Drummond releases the criminal from jail in an attempt for MI5 to beat MI6 at a safe-cracking operation.(n)

programme.title: Sorry
programme.desc: Timothy gets out of his depth while helping arrange Frank's wedding - and then falls for a bridesmaid.(n)

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line
programme.desc: Grim tracks down criminal carol singers, and Fowler falls victim to the ruthless Gasforth Amateur Dramatics Society. Goody, meanwhile, discovers giving presents to colleagues is not guaranteed to create goodwill. Festive instalment of the comedy from 1995, starring Rowan Atkinson and David Haig.(n)

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: A persistent door-to-door salesman makes grouchy Victor Meldrew see red - and an unending stream of junk mail through his letterbox threatens to push him over the brink into insanity. Richard Wilson, Annette Crosbie and Angus Deayton star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: A man foolishly believes a curse has been placed on him, so Truly, Entwistle and Alvin feel it is their duty to perform an exorcism. Peter Sallis and Frank Thornton star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Barry becomes dejected when his fitness-mad neighbour Boothroyd begins to outshine him in all things physical. However, he discovers that when it comes to karate, he may just have an advantage over his new rival. Long-running comedy, guest starring Brian Conley.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Will the Genuine Racer Please Stand Up?.
programme.desc: Howard becomes ill at ease with his lot in life, and tries to change his appearance so that not even Pearl would recognise him. But he soon discovers that the drawbacks of assuming someone else's identity are greater than the benefits.(n)

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Godber is feeling dejected after his romantic fortunes take a turn for the worse, so Fletch tries to revive his friend's flagging spirits. However, his cunning plan has one potential drawback - it involves his own daughter. Comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and Richard Beckinsale.(n)

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: The inmates decide on a wager as the parole board gathers, with Blanco odds-on favourite for release. However, the old lag turns down his freedom and leaves Fletcher in danger of losing a small fortune. Prison comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and David Jason.(n)

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: Kenzo's father asks for Janey's hand in marriage, but she is already smitten with good-looking Australian Craig - and Susan is thrilled to learn he is also planning a proposal. Comedy, starring Daniela Denby-Ashe, Robert Lindsay and Zoe Wanamaker.(n)

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line
programme.desc: Grim tracks down criminal carol singers, and Fowler falls victim to the ruthless Gasforth Amateur Dramatics Society. programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: A Short Introduction to Cooper's Rules.
programme.desc: Local PCs Cooper and Walsh try to master a new crime-fighting technique. However, the duo's carefully laid plans unravel when Barry decides to treat a retired vicar to a day trip. Long-running sitcom, starring Ken Kitson and Louis Emerick.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: The women of the village are impressed by a series of fanciful tales told by a retired jewel thief about his larcenous exploits in the south of France. However, the scoundrel's skills are put to the test when Marina and Miss Davenport seek his aid in helping Auntie Wainwright crack a keyless safe. John Challis guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: All That Glitters Is Not Elvis.
programme.desc: When Alvin and Entwistle witness Lance attempting to prove to his wife that Elvis Presley is still alive, the duo feel duty-bound to help him out, and organise for the King himself to make an appearance. Long-running comedy starring Brian Murphy, Burt Kwouk and Kenneth Cope.(n)

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: Kenzo's father asks for Janey's hand in marriage, but she is already smitten with good-looking Australian Craig - and Susan is thrilled to learn he is also planning a proposal. Comedy, starring Daniela Denby-Ashe, Robert Lindsay and Zoe Wanamaker.(n)

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Godber is feeling dejected after his romantic fortunes take a turn for the worse, so Fletch tries to revive his friend's flagging spirits. However, his cunning plan has one potential drawback - it involves his own daughter. Comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and Richard Beckinsale.(n)

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: The Goods begin to reap their just rewards for the hard work they have put into the garden, although Barbara is too tired and bored to appreciate the benefits. Sitcom, starring Richard Briers and Felicity Kendal.(n)

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom plans to diversify into pig farming, with the garden under control and the barter system starting to pay off, but underestimates the ferocity of Margo's opposition. Comedy, starring Richard Briers, Felicity Kendal and Penelope Keith.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Always one to jump on the latest passing bandwagon, Del-Boy goes eco-friendly and decides to create a better world for baby Damien and his generation - by starting his own bottled water business. Starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, Buster Merryfield and Tessa Peake-Jones. Christmas special from 1992.(n)

programme.title: Mrs Brown's Boys
programme.desc: The Browns are excited as preparations for Rory and Dino's big day are in full swing - although Agnes's mood is dampened when she meets flamboyant celebrity wedding planner La La Doggy. The foul-mouthed matriarch also clashes with Father Damien when he raises religious concerns about the ceremony - and to top it all off, she gets more than she bargained for when she invites Cathy's boyfriend's parents over for the evening. Hit comedy, starring Brendan O'Carroll, with Jennifer Gibney, Rory Cowan and Conor Moloney.(n)

programme.title: The Royle Family
programme.desc: Denise and Dave bring baby David to visit and Anthony and Darren do Ali G impressions. Award-winning comedy, starring Caroline Aherne.(n)

programme.title: The Royle Family
programme.desc: The family prepares for baby David's christening, with a reluctant Jim being coaxed out of his armchair to help Twiggy strip the dining room wallpaper - but using Barbara's fish slice to remove it instead of a steamer proves hard work. Award-winning comedy, starring Caroline Aherne, Craig Cash and Ricky Tomlinson.(n)

programme.title: Bridget & Eamon
programme.desc: Comedy spin-off from Republic of Telly following the lives of an unhappily married couple and their indeterminate number of children, character already well-known to the viewing public from their appearances on Republic of Telly. Eamon always spends the money from the trocaire box, so parish priest Fr Gabriel is keeping an eye on him this year, while Bridget hosts a Tupperware party that goes disastrously wrong when illegal condoms are delivered instead. Jennifer Zamparelli and Bernard O'Shea star.(n)

programme.title: Bridget & Eamon
programme.desc: The couple are chosen to be on the poster for the forthcoming divorce referendum, but Phelim returns home from America with some shocking news about their marriage.(n)

programme.title: Spaced
programme.desc: Two disillusioned twenty-somethings, one a broken-hearted skateboarder and comic-book artist, the other an aspiring journalist, are brought together by fate as they search for accommodation in London. Comedy, starring Simon Pegg and Jessica Hynes.(n)

programme.title: Spaced
programme.desc: Daisy and Tim throw a housewarming party to toast their new home, but find themselves being upstaged when Marsha's daughter Amber throws a bigger, louder bash upstairs. Comedy, starring Simon Pegg, Jessica Hynes, Mark Heap, Julia Deakin and Nick Frost.(n)

programme.title: Big Train
programme.desc: Comedy from the award-winning sketch show, featuring a cheating, chain-smoking, foul-mouthed mermaid, a unique method of teaching history, and knights who discover the problem of wearing Hawaiian shirts into battle. Kevin Eldon, Simon Pegg and Amelia Bullmore star.(n)

programme.title: Big Train
programme.desc: Sketches include a public information film about making ham sandwiches, an enthusiastic office worker who lives for his job, and a man about to have his legs amputated finding the time to toast his surgeon's birthday. Kevin Eldon, Mark Heap, Simon Pegg and Catherine Tate star.(n)

programme.title: Monty Python's Best Bits (Mostly)
programme.desc: Hugh Bonneville presents this five-part show looking back at the troupe's most popular sketches, with interjections from some of the biggest names in comedy revealing what makes Monty Python so special and how they have influenced their own careers. Contributors include Stephen Fry, Matt Lucas, Simon Pegg, Steve Coogan, Eddie Izzard, Chevy Chase and Bill Bailey.(n)

programme.title: Bob Monkhouse: Million Joke Man
programme.sub-title: The King of the Game Shows.
programme.desc: Paul O'Grady presents a retrospective look at the career of comedian Bob Monkhouse, which spanned more than half a century. He reflects on the 1970s and 1980s, when Monkhouse became the undisputed king of the TV game shows, hosting The Golden Shot, Celebrity Squares and Bob's Full House. Featuring rare and often previously unseen archive and contributions from friends.(n)

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.sub-title: In Luton Airport No One Can Hear You Scream.
programme.desc: The Meldrews return from an overseas holiday to find yet another disaster awaiting them - their home has been demolished. Richard Wilson and Annette Crosbie star.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: A weeping statue in the local church gives Del an idea for a money-making scheme to help a hospice under threat of closure. However, his efforts are thwarted by the weather. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?.
programme.desc: An old friend returns from Australia flushed with success and offers Del a share in his business empire Down Under. Although the prospect is tempting, it would mean leaving Nelson Mandela House and little brother Rodney behind. David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst star.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Always one to jump on the latest passing bandwagon, Del-Boy goes eco-friendly and decides to create a better world for baby Damien and his generation - by starting his own bottled water business. Starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, Buster Merryfield and Tessa Peake-Jones. Christmas special from 1992.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del-Boy becomes a yuppie, complete with red braces, Filofax and chrome briefcase. Meanwhile, Rodney begins attending a computer course at night school, where he meets Cassandra. Comedy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Dodgy dealer Del gets his hands on a consignment of self-inflating rubber dolls, which turn out to be filled with explosive gas. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: A retired jeweller offers Del-Boy the deal of a lifetime - then suddenly has a heart attack and gets taken to hospital with a briefcase containing 250 cut-price gold necklaces still chained to his wrist. Comedy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del enters one of Rodney's old paintings in a competition and is over the moon when he wins a holiday for three at a five-star hotel in Majorca. Soon after, the Trotter brothers and Cassandra arrive at Palma Airport - but Del-Boy reveals there is a slight snag. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Gwyneth Strong.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del's beloved mum apparently makes contact during a seance at the Nag's Head, inspiring him to visit the doctor to seek treatment for stomach cramps. Admitted to hospital for tests, he fears there is something seriously wrong with him - but a bacon sandwich and an alcoholic drink smuggled in by Rodney soon put the smile back on his face. Comedy, with David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Rodney ties the knot with Cassandra, but Del has more on his mind than best man duties as the dreaded Driscoll brothers arrive at the Nag's Head baying for his blood over some stolen mobile phones. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Gwyneth Strong.(n)

programme.title: Citizen Khan
programme.desc: Return of the comedy about a self-appointed community leader in Sparkhill, Birmingham. Mrs Khan lays down the law when Alia fails her exams, telling her husband to sign up their daughter at the Muslim Academy. But when he finds out how much it costs, he decides there's a better option. Adil Ray, Shobu Kapoor, Maya Sondhi and Bhavna Limbachia star.(n)

programme.title: Citizen Khan
programme.desc: Mr Khan is eager to get himself onto the mosque committee, but when he visits the manager to enrol his mother-in-law on an activity course, the conversation ends in a disagreement and the self-appointed community leader walks out in a huff. Adil Ray, Shobu Kapoor and Adlyn Ross star.(n)

programme.title: Citizen Khan
programme.desc: A local MP visits the mosque to endorse its mobile health-check unit and Mr Khan takes future son-in-law Amjad as his guinea pig - but things don't quite go to plan. Meanwhile, Mrs Khan and the girls are off to buy clothes for a friend's new baby. Comedy, starring Adil Ray, Shobu Kapoor, Abdullah Afzal, Maya Sondhi and Bhavna Limbachia.(n)

programme.title: Black Books
programme.desc: Manny decides to broaden the customers' horizons and organises a festival of travel writing - but is horrified when Fran falls for the well-groomed guest speaker. Bernard, meanwhile, is preoccupied with a new neighbour who looks set to take him to court - and decides to take matters into his own hands. Guest starring Julian Rhind-Tutt (Green Wing).(n)

programme.title: Black Books
programme.desc: While Bernard seems quite happy in the filthy shop, Manny and Fran decide a change of scenery is well overdue, and plan a big night out. However, it soon becomes clear the hirsute store assistant has his sights set firmly on a very specific event - and everyone has to dig out their boogie shoes. Final episode of the cult comedy, starring Dylan Moran, Bill Bailey and Tamsin Greig.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The five remaining bakers tackle patisserie in the quarter-finals, making 24 cream horns for their signature challenge, before creating mokatines for Mary's technical bake. For the showstopper, the cooks are challenged to make a religieuse a l'ancienne - three tiers of choux pastry eclairs filled with creme patissiere and decorated with icing and buttercream. The contestants must produce something that not only looks and tastes good, but also stays standing before judges Mary and Paul cast a critical eye over their efforts. Presented by Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: Marcus Wareing, Monica Galetti and Gregg Wallace set the five finalists an invention test in which they must create a dish without any meat, fish or poultry, before one is sent home. Each of the remaining four chefs is then put in charge of cooking one course for a dinner attended by 25 leading UK chefs, who hold 40 Michelin stars between them.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Mississippi Adventure
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers visit the hotbed of Cajun culture in Lafayette, Louisiana, where they sample crawfish and groove at a jam session.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Money Saving Meals
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver prepares roast shoulder of lamb with all the trimmings, before turning the leftovers into Moroccan-style crispy pastillas, and makes good use of stale bread by using it as part of a panzanella salad. The chef also shows a lover of takeaways how to dish up a beef rendang from the remains of a cut of brisket, and helps two people reduce their food waste.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Money Saving Meals
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver demonstrates wallet-friendly recipes for pot-roasted ham hocks, squash and spinach rotolo, and steak and chips, and shows a takeaway lover how to make sweet and sour fish balls for a fraction of the price of her favourite Chinese treat. The chef also inspires a pair of food wasters to make good use of all their leftover salad.(n)

programme.title: Food & Drink
programme.desc: Tom Kerridge is joined by Angela Hartnett for a discussion on how to make delicious, high-quality food on a tight budget, with the chef and restaurateur pitting her vanilla custard tart against the host's beef and blue cheese risotto. Plus, Oliver Peyton discovers how to spice up his life on the cheap, Kimberley Wilson lifts the lid on how to make great grub from waste food, and drinks expert Joe Wadsack selects the best cut-price wine.(n)

programme.title: Food & Drink
programme.desc: Chef and The Incredible Spice Men co-presenter Tony Singh joins Michel Roux Jr to prove that even in winter it's possible to eat well using seasonally available ingredients. Tony prepares a feast of venison with haggis ravioli, while Kate Goodman has a guide to matching whisky with food. Plus, author and broadcaster Stefan Gates joins in for a debate on food miles and their environmental impact.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: After six weeks of tough competition, the five remaining hopefuls enter the last week - four nights of culinary challenges after which one of them will be crowned MasterChef Champion. They begin by cooking a five-course dinner in memory of Winston Churchill at Cambridge University's Churchill College, trying to replicate a menu devised by leading chef Michael Caines. After that it's back to the kitchen to produce a dish inspired by a personal hero - and for one unlucky cook, this will be the last time they wear their MasterChef apron.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: The finalists are sent to learn new skills in Sweden, where they experience two very different restaurants. The first has no menu, with the chefs inventing dishes on the day with whatever ingredients their suppliers provide, and in the second, everything is cooked over an open fire. Back in the UK, they have to come up with an exceptional fish dish for John Torode, Gregg Wallace and renowned seafood chef Nathan Outlaw, with one more amateur leaving at the end of the show.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: The connoisseur of local food takes a gastronomic tour along the canal systems of southern France, from Bordeaux to Marseille. He samples seafood and regional cuisine, as well as exploring a variety of traditional recipes, including artichoke salad with poached egg, eels in cider, and bass with beurre blanc.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: The connoisseur of local food explores the banks of the River Garonne on board a 100-year-old converted barge, and savours the delights of French provincial cooking including magret de canard and petit sale. Other dishes featured are clams in white garlic sauce, eels in parsley and garlic butter, and steak tartare.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: The chef's travels take him along the Canal Lateral a la Garonne, where he goes fishing for shad, and is invited to attend a barbecue lunch. He also investigates the produce on offer at Nerac's local market, and joins the villagers of Bruch for a snail dish.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: The connoisseur of local food continues his barge excursion through south-west France, visiting the city of Agen and tasting the first melon of the season in Quercy before cooking the famous Gascon dish poule au pot.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: The chef's travels take him to the River Tarn, where he joins a local angler to fish for pike. He also rustles up a popular confit of duck with braised red cabbage, and meets a chef in Moissac whose dishes are a celebration of seasonal specialities.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: The connoisseur of local food continues his barge journey through south-west France, sampling the famous sausages as he reaches Toulouse and creating the country's most popular ready-meal cassoulet further downstream.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: Rick's barge trip brings him to Castelnaudary, where he visits the canteen of the French Foreign Legion, prepares a spicy tagine with couscous and enjoys a three-course lunch consisting of roast leg of veal with potato gratin dauphinioise, goats' cheese and strawberries.(n)

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Donnie Brasco, a Mafia mobster who's thick as thieves with Lefty Ruggerio (Al Pacino), a leading man in the Organisation. But Donnie is also Joe Pistone, an Fbi agent sent to infiltrate who instead becomes seduced by the camaraderie on offer. Mike Newell's film, based on a true story (Pistone is still part of the witness protection programme), is more concerned about friendship, loyalty and the agony of duplicity than the reality of mob violence(n)

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Donnie Brasco, a Mafia mobster who's thick as thieves with Lefty Ruggerio (Al Pacino), a leading man in the Organisation. But Donnie is also Joe Pistone, an Fbi agent sent to infiltrate who instead becomes seduced by the camaraderie on offer. Mike Newell's film, based on a true story (Pistone is still part of the witness protection programme), is more concerned about friendship, loyalty and the agony of duplicity than the reality of mob violence(n)

programme.desc: Jack Black and Mos Def re-enact everything from Ghostbusters to Rush Hour when the tapes in their video store are wiped. Hit slacker comedy from director Michel Gondry. (2008)(97 mins)(n)

programme.title: Crooklyn
programme.desc: Spike Lee and his siblings Cinque Lee and Joie Lee co-wrote this nostalgic but unglamorized look at a family growing up in Brooklyn in the 1970s, inspired by their own childhood. Woody Carmichael (Delroy Lindo) is a jazz musician whose career is in a slump; he once made a good living as a session musician, but he has moved away from it to devote himself to more serious music, a choice that has not worked out well from a financial standpoint. His wife Carolyn (Alfre Woodard) works as a school teacher to keep food on the table. The Carmichaels have five children, a bright and introspective daughter named Troy (Zelda Harris) and four sons with a habit of causing trouble, and they all share an apartment in a brownstone in Brooklyn. Crooklyn follows the Carmichaels as the kids learn the funny and painful lessons of growing up, Mom and Dad balance their love for each other against the financial and personal difficulties of the creative life, and they all try to get along with the often eccentric neighbors on their block. Crooklyn's soundtrack is enlivened by classic 70s R&B hits, including selections by Sly and the Family Stone, The Jackson Five, Curtis Mayfield, The Staple Singers, and The Chambers Brothers(n)

programme.title: December Boys
programme.desc: Harry Potter star Daniel Radcliffe stars in this coming of age drama as one of four young orphans who struggle to compete for the attentions of the same family(n)

programme.title: The Winning Season
programme.desc: A man (Sam Rockwell) attempts to pull his life together by teaching his daughter's (Emma Roberts) high-school basketball team in this indie comedy by Grace Is Gone writer/director James C. Strouse. Rob Corddry co-stars in this Gigi/Plum Pictures production(n)

programme.title: Bend It like Beckham

programme.title: Making of 'All Eyez on Me'
programme.desc: A look at "All Eyez on Me," a 2017 biopic of legendary rapper Tupac Shakur that chronicles his rise to fame and untimely death at the age of 25. The film stars Demetrius Shipp Jr., Danai Gurira and Lauren Cohan, and is directed by Benny Boom(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 3
programme.desc: Brett Ratner's martial-arts action-comedy sequel starring Chris Tucker and Jackie Chan. When the Chinese Ambassador to the US is shot while in the act of divulging the whereabouts of a major Triad leader, the American authorities once more send Chief Inspector Lee and Detective James Carter into the fray. Lee quickly corners the would-be assassin, Kenji, but the shock of coming face-to-face with an old friend gives the baddie just enough time to escape. Kenji's trail leads the mismatched cops to Paris, where car chases and a sequence among the under-dressed dancers of the Folies Bergère await them, plus rather a lot of dodgy French stereotypes and a finale atop the Eiffel Tower(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: Rell (Jordan Peele) becomes attached to an adorable kitten named Keanu while dealing with a painful breakup. But when he returns home one night with his cousin Clarence (Keegan-Michael Key), he is devastated to learn that his house has been burglarized and his feline friend is missing. The nerdy duo attempt to find the culprits who took Keanu, and they eventually get in way over their heads as their search leads them to infiltrate a violent street gang. Peter Atencio directed this irreverent action comedy, which co-stars Method Man, Luis Guzman, Will Forte, and Nia Long(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
programme.desc: (2005) Enchanting children's fantasy, based on the classic novel by CS Lewis. When young World War Two evacuee Lucy Pevensie hides in an old wardrobe during a game of hide and seek, she finds herself transported to the magical land of Narnia, locked in eternal winter by the evil White Witch. Her siblings do not believe her when she tells them of this strange new world, but they are soon in Narnia themselves, fighting alongside the noble lion Aslan to defeat the witch and her mighty army.Dir: Andrew Adamson. (T) (Digital Dolby 5.1)(n)

programme.title: Blast From the Past
programme.desc: At the height of the Cuban missile crisis, Calvin Webber takes his pregnant wife Helen into a cavernous air raid shelter. Misinterpreting a plane crash as war, they spend the next 35 years entombed there. Their son, Adam, is brought up learning foreign languages, dancing, boxing and playing in the astro-turfed 'back yard'. When he is sent to get supplies from the world above, he meets Eve and, in this romantic comedy, discovers the good and bad sides of 1990s America(n)

programme.desc: An Amish-style community lives in fear of unseen creatures in the woods, until one resident is forced to brave his phobia and venture into the forest(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: Alice leads a team of commandos into the multi-national Umbrella Corporation's locked-down bunker, which is controlled by the main computer, The Red Queen. The unit is sealed because of a virus that gassed all the staff but, as Alice and her team discover, the virus has re-animated them. Now, as well as facing the computer's weaponry, they must tackle the living dead to prevent the virus escaping into the outside world. Paul W Anderson's horror thriller is based on the successful computer game(n)

programme.title: Appaloosa
programme.desc: Ed Harris directs and stars in this western as Virgil Cole, who, with his lifelong buddy Everett Hitch plays a lawman for hire, cleaning up towns beset by bad guys before moving on. Their latest job is in the town of Appaloosa, which is terrorised by evil rancher Randall Bragg. But matters are complicated when Virgil falls for widow Allison French. Everett, worried his distracted friend will lose his edge when Bragg makes his move, must decide on the best course of action as, between the shoot- outs, a delicate balance between romance and friendship must be struck(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: The Keenan Vortex. Richard ponders a deal with the tech world's latest "it" boy; Jack faces setbacks(n)

programme.title: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
programme.desc: After a family tragedy, a boy follows a series of clues that lead him to a mysterious orphanage on a remote Welsh island. There, he discovers a community of children with unusual abilities(n)

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Roland Emmerich returns to the helm for this long-awaited sequel to the 1996 blockbuster Independence Day. Fearful of another attack, the nations of Earth have teamed up against their common enemy -- the extraterrestrials who brought humanity to the brink of extinction. Using recovered alien technology to bolster their defenses, the alliance braces itself for another invasion. Jeff Goldblum and Bill Pullman reprise their roles from the original film, while Liam Hemsworth, Jessie Usher, and Maika Monroe are among the new additions to the cast(n)

programme.title: 24/7 Ward/kovalev 2
programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: The Fight Game With Jim Lampley
programme.desc: Features, interviews and updates on boxing with the veteran sportscaster(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: A talk show about current events(n)

programme.title: The English Patient
programme.desc: Epic romantic drama, set at the end of World War II, in which a badly burnt - and unidentified - pilot recounts to the nurse tending him a doomed love affair with a colleague's wife. Adapted from Michael Ondaatje's Booker Prize-winning novel, the film won nine Oscars, including Best Picture, Director and Supporting Actress(n)

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: Andy Tennant's comedy adventure stars Matthew McConaughey as Benjamin Finnegan, a treasure hunter who finally pins down the Carribbean location of a sunken Spanish galleon loaded with gold. He convinces his ex-wife Tess to use her persuasive powers to get her boss Nigel Honeycutt to lend him his luxury cruiser to use to dive for the treasure. But as they head out to the wreck, they have to beat Benjamin's mentor Moe Fitch and gangster rapper Bigg Bunny, who also have designs on the treasure(n)

programme.title: Making of 'All Eyez on Me'
programme.desc: A look at "All Eyez on Me," a 2017 biopic of legendary rapper Tupac Shakur that chronicles his rise to fame and untimely death at the age of 25. The film stars Demetrius Shipp Jr., Danai Gurira and Lauren Cohan, and is directed by Benny Boom(n)

programme.title: Live Free or Die Hard
programme.desc: An old-fashioned cop emerges to foil a high-tech attack on the country's computer infrastructure as Bruce Willis brings back one of the biggest action franchises in screen history. It's been over a decade since audiences last saw New York cop John McClane (Willis), but now, as the world's greatest criminal mastermind (Timothy Olyphant) attempts to cripple the entire country with an innovative act of technological terrorism, only one cop can insure that the integrity of the system stays intact. In this, the fourth installment of the long-running action series, Underworld director Len Wiseman picks up the torch formerly carried by directors John McTiernan and Renny Harlin to helm a script penned by Mark Bomback(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: A talk show about current events(n)

programme.title: The Fight Game With Jim Lampley
programme.desc: Features, interviews and updates on boxing with the veteran sportscaster(n)

programme.title: 24/7 Ward/kovalev 2
programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Scream 2
programme.desc: Director Wes Craven and screenwriter Kevin Williamson reunited for this sequel, another sly spoof of the slasher genre. This time, Gale Weathers' account of the grisly killings in the first film has been made into a movie, which inspires more murders and mayhem. Courteney Cox, Neve Campbell, David Arquette, Jamie Kennedy, Jerry O'Connell, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Laurie Metcalf(n)

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: In Hollywood, Sidney Prescott must once again confront her demons when the stars of a horror movie sequel based on her life begin to die(n)

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: This biopic of airline pilot Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger depicts his successful emergency landing of an Airbus A320 on the Hudson River in January 2009. In the aftermath of this unprecedented feat, he must endure the weight of sudden fame, second-guessing by investigators and his own doubts about his actions that fateful day(n)

programme.title: The Wizard of Lies
programme.desc: Adaptation of journalist Diana B. Henriques' account of financier Bernie Madoff's orchestration of one of the largest frauds in U.S. history that led to financial ruin for thousands of investors and, in the process, his own family's destruction(n)

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Judge. Daniel woos Jonah to land a coveted interview. Meanwhile, Selina takes a trip; and Amy lobbies Selina to allow her to whip Mike into shape(n)

programme.title: The Nice Guys
programme.desc: In this absolutely hysterical action buddy comedy set in 1970s Los Angeles, a bumbling private eye and an enforcer-for-hire team up to find a missing woman with ties to the porn industry. In time, their sleuthing reveals a far-reaching conspiracy involving corruption in the federal government(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two siblings uncover a harrowing secret about their grandparents while spending a week at their remote farm in Pennsylvania(n)

programme.desc: Selfie. An aspiring writer persuades The Guy to stay for an interview, but it's interrupted by her social-media habits. Meanwhile, a former customer needs The Guy's help(n)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: In this action-packed comic-book adventure set in the 1980s, the X-Men are forced to confront an ancient mutant called Apocalypse. After the resurrected villain recruits four superpowered followers, Professor X and his charges attempt to stop them(n)

programme.title: The Cider House Rules
programme.desc: Homer Wells is an orphan who spent most of his childhood at the St. Cloud Orphanage in rural Maine, where he grew up under the strong but affectionate care of Dr. Wilbur Larch. Larch has passed along his medical education to Homer, and the young man helps the doctor care for abandoned children and the newborn babies of unwed mothers; however, Homer refuses to assist Larch with illegal abortions performed on the side(n)

programme.title: Immigration Tango
programme.desc: In this clever comedy, romantic complications ensue when an immigrant couple (Elika Portnoy, Carlos Leon) get quickie marriages with their two best friends (Ashley Wolfe, McCaleb Burnett) in order to obtain permanent residency in the United States(n)

programme.title: Down Periscope
programme.desc: A cocky Navy officer is ordered aboard a WWII-era submarine with a crew of misfits to participate in war games(n)

programme.title: MASH
programme.desc: Irreverent black comedy following the exploits of a host of offbeat characters at a medical unit during the Korean war, including surgeons Hawkeye Pierce and Trapper John McIntyre who create havoc with their martini parties and practical jokes while the war rages around them. The film spawned a successful television series and won an Oscar for best screenplay, written by Ring Lardner Jr(n)

programme.title: Miami Rhapsody
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a young woman for whom getting engaged is only the first step in a nightmare journey through the relationships minefield. Young advertising copywriter Gwyn Marcus (Sarah Jessica Parker) faces the biggest challenge of her life when she decides to accept the marriage proposal of her boyfriend Matt (Gil Bellows)(n)

programme.title: Screwed
programme.desc: Household servant Willard, sick of the meanness of his millionairess employer, snaffles her hound Muffin but botches the job so hopelessly that everyone thinks that he's been kidnapped(n)

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: Expanding on their Saturday Night Live characters, John Belushi and Dan Aykroyd star as Jake and Elwood Blues, two white boys with black soul. Sporting cool shades and look-alike suits, Jake and Elwood are dispatched on a "mission from God" by their former teacher, Sister Mary Stigmata (Kathleen Freeman). Said mission is to raise $5000 to save an orphanage. In the course of their zany adventures, the Blues Brothers run afoul of neo-Nazi Henry Gibson, perform the theme from Rawhide before the most unruly bar crowd in written history, and lay waste to hundreds of cars on the streets and freeways of Chicago. In case you aren't swept up in the infectuous nuttiness of the brothers Blue, you might have fun spotting film's legion of guest stars, including James Brown, Cab Calloway, Aretha Franklin, Ray Charles, John Candy, Carrie Fisher, Steve Lawrence, Twiggy, Paul Reubens (aka Pee-Wee Herman), Frank Oz, and Steven Spielberg(n)

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: A teenager turns his house into a brothel while his parents are away in this sharp comedy highlighted by Cruise's star-making performance(n)

programme.title: The Sweetest Thing
programme.desc: When it comes to dating, Christina Walters has a golden rule: avoid searching for Mr. Right and focus on Mr. Right Now. That is until one night at a club when she unexpectedly meets Peter, only to see him suddenly disappear the next day. She and her best friend Courtney decide to break the rules and go on a road trip to find him, encountering numerous misadventures along the way(n)

programme.desc: After her husband dies, an English widow picks up her tenor sax and hunts down her former swing bandmates, and urges them to play again(n)

Bill Murray's directorial debut(n)

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: Rapunzel. Only HBO would have thought of staging the story of Rapunzel in New Orleans. The classic story is brought back to life with a Cajun/African-American twist. Also adding new zest to this animated gem are the voices of Whoopi Goldberg, Tisha Campbell, and Meshach Taylor. In this updated version, Rapunzel is captured by the evil diva Zenobia to become her apprentice diva. Never fear -- the story does end happily as Rapunzel is rescued by a brave prince. This updated fairly tale would have the Brothers Grimm wondering "why didn't we think of that?"(n)

programme.desc: Mr. Monk Goes to the Dentist. In most Monk episodes, the sanity of obsessive-compulsive detective Adrian Monk (Tony Shalhoub) is a matter of debate. This time, however, it is Monk's police colleague Lt. Disher (Jason Gray-Stanford) who is suspected of temporary insanity. While under sedation in a dentist's chair, Disher sees--or thinks he sees--dentist Dr. Bloom (Jon Favreau) commit a murder. Unfortunately, no one believes Disher's story, not even his superior Captain Stottlemeyer (Ted Levine), and as result the lieutenant quits the force in disgust. Determined to prove that he was not hallucinating under the influence of anesthesia, Disher asks Monk (Tony Shalhoub). Before the story has reached its conclusion, Monk has uncovered a complex scheme involving stolen bank certificates--and has left himself wide open (or is it "open wide"?) for a painful dental demise right out of Marathon Man(n)

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: Boobs in Arms. World War II was just heating up, but the U.S. hadn't yet entered the fighting when the Three Stooges made this comic short. It opens with the boys selling greeting cards on the street, none too successfully. One surly guy in particular is a victim of the Stooges' harassment. To get away from his wrath, the boys dash into an apartment building, where they find a weepy young woman who thinks her husband doesn't love her anymore. To help her out, the Stooges offer to try to make her husband jealous. The woman's spouse turns out to be the very same man they harassed a few minutes earlier. To get away from him -- again -- the guys get in what they think is a bread line, but it's really a recruitment line for the Army. In a flash the Stooges are in uniform -- only to discover that their sergeant is the very same angry husband. They manage to make it through basic training and are sleeping through bomb blasts when they're woken up and sent on a mission. The sergeant has been captured and they're supposed to bomb enemy headquarters with laughing gas. Naturally, the gas shell explodes on them and they're captured. At the enemy headquarters, they manage to knock everyone unconscious while laughing uncontrollably. The place is being shelled by the American troops, and the Stooges, still laughing, ride one of the shells as it soars out of the building(n)

programme.title: Bruce Almighty
programme.desc: Six years since they worked together on Liar Liar, and nearly a decade after Ace Ventura: Pet Detective placed them on the Hollywood A-list, director Tom Shadyac and Jim Carrey re-team once again for this high-concept fantasy comedy, the first film for both since making the non-comedic missteps Dragonfly and The Majestic, respectively. Carrey stars as television reporter Bruce Nolan. Despite his status as a well-liked minor celebrity and the unconditional love of his beautiful girlfriend, Grace (Jennifer Aniston), Bruce can't seem to shake his dissatisfaction with the shortfalls of his everyday life. After an exceptionally misfortune-filled day, Bruce turns to the sky and lays into God, accusing Him of doing a poor job of running things on Earth. Bruce is so vehement that God (Morgan Freeman) transports Bruce to his office and makes him a once-in-a-lifetime offer. If Bruce thinks He is so inadequate, God tells him that he'll bestow omnipotence upon Bruce for 24 hours. However, if by the end of that period of time Bruce is unsuccessful in his attempts to make the world a better place, as a consequence, God will inflict a cataclysm upon Earth that will revert things back to the Dark Ages. Written by Steve Koren and Mark O'Keefe, Bruce Almighty features supporting performances by Steve Carrell, Philip Baker Hall, and Eddie Jemison(n)

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: Another fun comedy for the Jim Carrey fans, 'Liar Liar' brings the star as Fletcher Reed, a successful lawyer who has built his career by lying. A divorced father, Fletcher has always given precedence to his job until on his son's eight birthday party ' that he had sworn he would attend -, Fletcher makes up such a lame excuse that when it comes time to blow out the candles, the boy makes a wish: that his dad could go just one day without telling a lie. The wish comes true but Fletcher's new compulsion for only saying the truth will make his next day in court very interesting(n)

Plus, journalist Geoff Ho talks about his experience fighting back against the London Bridge attackers and why others should follow his example. Presented by Ben Shephard, Kate Garraway and Charlotte Hawkins.(n)

At the end of the show each team reveals what its members think is the masterpiece and whoever chooses the most masterpieces wins £1,000.(n)

programme.title: Tipping Point

Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot.(n)

The extreme angler meets an attack survivor whose chilling account identifies the underwater assassin as `el diablo rojo' - the red devil, prompting Jeremy to brave sea-sickening conditions to track down a horrific beast, apparently even more fearsome than sharks.(n)

programme.desc: Robert and Adam are shocked when they find Daniel unconscious, and Rana persuades Kate to let Johnny tell Aidan about his condition in his own time. Meanwhile, Riggs begins to view Agent Palmer in a new light, while Murtaugh is left worried after Trish makes a spontaneous decision. However, it's not long before they discover the truth, prompting her sister Kerry to turn up and demand that she leave the man who has made her life a misery for so long. Brooks becomes torn between the belief of his former partner Bernie Rawlins and mounting doubts over the ability of current colleague Casey, and the case unearths the possibility that more ghosts from his drinking days will come back to haunt him. programme.title: Prime Suspect

Harry arrives in London in 1908 with a grand plan - to open the biggest and finest department store in the world, and to do it within the year. With a frosty reception from the British press, the last-minute departure of a business partner and an ever-growing staff already on the payroll, not to mention his wife and family arriving from the US, the pressure is on for Harry to complete the project on time. As opening day approaches, he pulls out all the stops to achieve his dream - whatever the cost. With Frances O'Connor, Trystan Gravelle, Aisling Loftus and Tom Goodman-Hill.(n)

But then another body turns up and the case takes on a new dimension. David Soul and Patrick Baladi guest star.(n)

Guest starring Suzanne Bertish (Rome) and Tristan Gemmill (Casualty), with Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris.(n)

programme.desc: A tough police detective is assigned to protect a Mob witness for 48 hours, only for hitmen to find their hiding place and try to silence the informant. The rebellious cop realises something does not add up and goes in search of both the killers and whoever told them where to locate their target - but an ambitious politician wants him off the case. Thriller, starring Steve McQueen, Jacqueline Bisset, Robert Vaughn and Robert Duvall.(n)

programme.title: Bullitt

programme.title: TT 2017
programme.sub-title: Isle of Man TT: Review Show Two.
programme.desc: Craig Doyle presents the second part of a review of the famous motorcycling event, which recently took place on the Isle of Man, and is considered the jewel in the crown of the motorcycle road racing calendar.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: A woman is tormented by calls from her supposedly deceased husband, whose lifeless body was pulled from the sea several weeks earlier. While she is admitted to a sanatorium to prevent a nervous breakdown, Templar works on the premise that her spouse may indeed still be alive. Roger Moore and Sylvia Syms star.(n)

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: Templar has to find out whether a cool blonde is a secret agent or a crook - and if she could do him harm. Sixties spy adventure, directed by and starring Roger Moore.(n)

programme.title: Motorsport UK
programme.desc: Richard John Neil presents action from Thruxton, featuring the F4 British Championship and the Renault UK Clio Cup.(n)

programme.title: BRDC Formula 3 Championship Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the fourth round of the season at Silverstone, which was set to feature the 10th, 11th and 12th races of the season.(n)
