programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: A young surfer is hunted by a great white shark at a secluded beach, and ends up stranded on an embankment away from the shoreline. Alone and wounded, she attempts to survive the attack and get ashore in this bone-chilling thriller(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: A Prayer for Mad Sweeney. After an over-too-quickly reunion with Shadow, Laura joins an unlikely travel companion on the road back to life and back to Shadow. Mad Sweeney's long, often tragic past is explored(n)

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: Set just three decades into the future, Alex Proyas's all-action science-fiction film is inspired by Isaac Asimov's 1950s short story. The science of robotics is so advanced that humanoid-looking servants have been developed, ready to obey any command from a human. When the chief designer of US Robotics, the biggest manufacturer of this new brand, is found dead in the company's atrium after a fall from the upper floor, it has all the hallmarks of suicide, and Chicago cop Del Spooner is assigned to the case. But technophobe Spooner doesn't believe that all robots are harmless. Despite opposition from both his superiors and the company, he investigates further and soon his suspicions centre on one robot, Sonny. Is 'he' one of an army of conscious, violent robots ready to challenge their human masters?(n)

programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: Ben (Jimmy Fallon) must choose between his love for Lindsey (Drew Barrymore) and the baseball team he supports, the Boston Red Sox. Based on Nick Hornby's novel Fever Pitch. Based on Nick Hornby's novel Fever Pitch and released in America under that title, the two leads bring the same warmth and humour to their roles as their British counterparts. Even sports fans unfamiliar with baseball will know the pain that comes from attending an important function when your team are playing a crucial match(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Remake of the Steve McQueen caper film with Pierce Brosnan as a billionaire art fancier who orchestrates the theft of a priceless masterpiece(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Jerry Maguire es uno de los mejores hombres de SMI, una cotizada agencia dedicada a la promoción de deportistas. Su vida es perfecta hasta el día en el que se da cuenta de la importancia que tienen las personas sobre el dinero. Ese día es despedido y abandonado por todos sus amigos. Ahora viene lo más difícil, empezar de cero con un futbolista de segunda categoría como único cliente y una madre soltera como secretaria(n)

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: Set just three decades into the future, Alex Proyas's all-action science-fiction film is inspired by Isaac Asimov's 1950s short story. The science of robotics is so advanced that humanoid-looking servants have been developed, ready to obey any command from a human. When the chief designer of US Robotics, the biggest manufacturer of this new brand, is found dead in the company's atrium after a fall from the upper floor, it has all the hallmarks of suicide, and Chicago cop Del Spooner is assigned to the case. But technophobe Spooner doesn't believe that all robots are harmless. Despite opposition from both his superiors and the company, he investigates further and soon his suspicions centre on one robot, Sonny. Is 'he' one of an army of conscious, violent robots ready to challenge their human masters?(n)

programme.title: Glengarry Glen Ross
programme.desc: David Mamet adapted his Pulitzer Prize-winning play for this riveting 1992 screen version featuring a great ensemble cast. Al Pacino, Jack Lemmon, Kevin Spacey and Ed Harris brilliantly bring Mamet's pungent dialogue to life, playing cutthroat real-estate agents who lie, cheat, steal and do whatever else it takes to get to the top. In a role created especially for the film, Alec Baldwin is unforgettable in a blistering one-scene performance as a foul-mouthed sales "motivator."(n)

programme.title: Fragile
programme.desc: Nurse Amy Nicholls is working at a children's hospital about to close, readying the last children to be moved. But something does not want them to leave, and will stop at nothing to keep them there(n)

programme.title: Head Games
programme.desc: This thorough, thought-provoking documentary examines the latest scientific data involving brain injuries among athletes. The film includes interviews with coaches, players and sports executives(n)

programme.title: Aloft
programme.desc: A mother reunites with her estranged son, whom she abandoned two decades earlier after a strange encounter with a faith healer(n)

programme.title: Henry Poole Is Here
programme.desc: A man suffering from a terminal illness moves to a suburb of Los Angeles to live out his final days in peace, but his meddling neighbour becomes convinced she can see the face of Jesus in a stain on the wall of his house and starts leading pilgrimages to the site(n)

programme.title: She's the Best Thing in It
programme.desc: An award-winning actress with a long and diverse career, Mary Louise Wilson rebels against fewer job offers and heads to her hometown of New Orleans to teach acting at Tulane University(n)

programme.title: The Hollars
programme.desc: A striving cartoonist is forced to return back to his family when his mother falls ill, while awaiting the birth of his first child(n)

programme.title: Waking Life
programme.desc: A man tries to figure out whether he's living in reality or whether he's just dreaming. While trying to figure out a way to wake up, he runs into many people on his way; some of which offer one sentence asides on life, others delving deeply into existential questions and life's mysteries(n)

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Psychedelic road movie, adapted from Hunter S Thompson's cult novel, about a journalist and his attorney friend who drive from LA to Las Vegas on a huge drugs binge, finding paranoia and misadventure at every turn(n)

programme.title: Hedwig and the Angry Inch
programme.desc: Urged by his US Army boyfriend to change his sex, East German rocker Hedwig goes under the knife. But it all goes slightly wrong and the recently emigrated Hedwig is dumped and left in the middle of Kansas. An off-Broadway hit, mixing comedy with pathos(n)

programme.title: How to Kill Your Neighbor's Dog
programme.desc: Kenneth Branagh stars as Peter McGowan, a critically acclaimed playwright whose last few works haven't done well. His life is made even more difficult by trying to fix his latest production, a wife who desperately wants kids (Robin Wright Penn), and a neighbor's barking dog that keeps him up at night. He needs a believable child character for his latest work and he realizes he knows nothing about kids. He decides to use his new next door neighbor's daughter Amy as a role model. As he gets to know her better, their lives become increasingly intertwined(n)

programme.title: Henry Poole Is Here
programme.desc: A man suffering from a terminal illness moves to a suburb of Los Angeles to live out his final days in peace, but his meddling neighbour becomes convinced she can see the face of Jesus in a stain on the wall of his house and starts leading pilgrimages to the site(n)

programme.title: The Hollars
programme.desc: A striving cartoonist is forced to return back to his family when his mother falls ill, while awaiting the birth of his first child(n)

programme.title: Ten Thousand Saints
programme.desc: A punk-loving teen moves to New York City in the late '80s with his bohemian dad, and gets caught up in the local music scene. He also befriends a girl his age who's coping with an unplanned pregnancy(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Hard-hitting docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on then-president George W. Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after the validity of key documents was questioned(n)

programme.title: Spread
programme.desc: An unemployed drifter gets by living off a succession of wealthy older lovers, the latest of whom is a successful Los Angeles attorney. However, his carefree existence takes an unexpected turn when he falls in love with an equally directionless waitress(n)

programme.title: American Son
programme.desc: A young man tries to tie up some loose ends before he goes to war in this independent drama from director Neil Abramson. Mike Holland (Nick Cannon) is nineteen years old and has just completed his basic training as a private in the United States Marine Corps. Mike has a four-day leave so he can visit his family for Thanksgiving, and then has orders for combat duty in Iraq. Mike wants to spend time with his family and friends before he ships out, but he doesn't want to tell anyone that he'll be stationed in Iraq. While taking the bus home to Bakersfield, California, Mike meets Cristina (Melonie Diaz), and it doesn't take long for him to realize he's infatuated with her. Mike makes a date to spend some time with Cristina, but he already has a busy schedule over the next four days. Mike catches up with his little sister (Erica Gluck), his doting mother (April Grace) and her taciturn new husband (Tom Sizemore), and sees his estranged father (Chi McBride) for the first time in years. Mike also hangs out with his best friend Jake (Matt O'Leary), but discovers he's begun taking a different path in life while Mike was in boot camp. And Mike happens to meet a disabled soldier back from Iraq (Jay Hernandez) who gives him an idea of what he can expect during his tour of duty. American Son was screened in competition at the 2008 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Our Little Sister
programme.desc: At their estranged father's funeral, three twentysomething siblings learn that they have a teenage half sister, and invite her to live with them in the seaside town of Kamakura(n)

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
programme.desc: Craig Phillips, winner of Channel 4's Big Brother, introduces the first of his two favourite films. One of the most successful British films of all time, Mike Newell's now-classic 'feel-good' movie stars Hugh Grant and Andie McDowell as the couple who seem made for each other but seem intent on staying apart. Their central performances are brilliantly supported by Kristin Scott Thomas, James Fleet and Simon Callow(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Hard-hitting docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on then-president George W. Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after the validity of key documents was questioned(n)

programme.title: Infinitely Polar Bear
programme.desc: Maya Forbes autobiographically inflected Infinitely Polar Bear stars Mark Ruffalo as Cameron, a man who suffers from bipolar disorder. After a breakdown forces him to leave his family and move into a halfway house, he attempts to rebuild a relationship with his two daughters, and win back the trust of his wife Maggie (Zoe Saldana). When Maggie opts to go to business school in New York, they decide that he will move back in and take care of the day-to-day needs for the kids. Due to his mercurial nature, this leads to a series of quirky, funny, and sometimes frightening episodes. Infinitely Polar Bear screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: Siblings reunite at their childhood home after their parents, avant-garde artists who specialise in public comedy skits, go missing. They soon wonder if their parents are truly in trouble, or if their disappearance is their final stunt(n)

programme.title: Our Little Sister
programme.desc: At their estranged father's funeral, three twentysomething siblings learn that they have a teenage half sister, and invite her to live with them in the seaside town of Kamakura(n)

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: In this witty, luminous and bittersweet comedy, the grieving widow of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing(n)

programme.title: Far From Heaven
programme.desc: The idyllic world of a 1950s wife and mother is shattered by a shocking discovery about her husband and a forbidden love affair(n)

programme.title: The Invisible Woman
programme.desc: An actress wrestles with feelings of guilt and remorse following an affair with Charles Dickens(n)

programme.title: Infinitely Polar Bear
programme.desc: Maya Forbes autobiographically inflected Infinitely Polar Bear stars Mark Ruffalo as Cameron, a man who suffers from bipolar disorder. After a breakdown forces him to leave his family and move into a halfway house, he attempts to rebuild a relationship with his two daughters, and win back the trust of his wife Maggie (Zoe Saldana). When Maggie opts to go to business school in New York, they decide that he will move back in and take care of the day-to-day needs for the kids. Due to his mercurial nature, this leads to a series of quirky, funny, and sometimes frightening episodes. Infinitely Polar Bear screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Swimming With Sharks
programme.desc: Buddy Ackerman is a corporate cutthroat who reigns over an entry level job anyone would kill for. The catch is, Buddy is the Boss from Hell! Ask Buddy's personal assistant, Guy, who is eager to climb the corporate ladder. On his first day, Guy quickly learns that no opportunity this promising comes without a cost(n)

programme.title: Ride
programme.desc: A rag tag group of rap hopefuls is persuaded by record company executives to take a bus to Miami for a video shoot. Of course, this ride turns out to be anything but smooth. The funniest parts of this satire on the world of hip hop and rappers are the in-jokes and cameo appearances by famous names from the genre(n)

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: Kevin Caffery is a professional thief with taste and style who gets a tip for an easy heist: Billionaire tycoon Max Fairbanks' unoccupied beachfront mansion. But as Kevin is tossing Faberge eggs into his professional pillowcase, he finds himself face to face with the billionaire. Just before the cops drag Kevin away, Max spies Kevin's good-luck ring and decides to claim it as his own Only one problem...the ring was given to Kevin by his new love, and he is determined to get it back. How far will these two men go? As far as they have to. Even if it means divorce, public scandal, financial ruin, and prison. This battle of capitalist vs. robber escalates into a colossal tournament of egos threatening to take both men and everyone around them down(n)

programme.title: Safe Men
programme.desc: Feel-good comedy of errors about three loveably inept criminals. In a spoof of buddy movies, a group of tone-deaf musicians are forced by the Mafia to attempt to crack three safes in a week - or else(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A female-led reboot of the classic franchise(n)

programme.title: Breakin' All the Rules
programme.desc: After his fiancée leaves him, a down-on-his-luck former magazine editor (Jamie Foxx) writes a bestselling relationship guide for men. Gabrielle Union costars in this charming and quick-paced romantic comedy. Morris Chestnut, Peter MacNicol, Jennifer Esposito, Bianca Lawson(n)

programme.title: Swimming With Sharks
programme.desc: Buddy Ackerman is a corporate cutthroat who reigns over an entry level job anyone would kill for. The catch is, Buddy is the Boss from Hell! Ask Buddy's personal assistant, Guy, who is eager to climb the corporate ladder. On his first day, Guy quickly learns that no opportunity this promising comes without a cost(n)

programme.title: Idle Hands
programme.desc: Gruesome horror comedy about a pot-smoking teen slacker (Devon Sawa) who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A female-led reboot of the classic franchise(n)

programme.title: Only the Lonely
programme.desc: A bittersweet tale of a single, 38-year-old Chicago cop who has lived with his mother all his life. When he falls in love with the shy daughter of a local mortician, he finds his resolve challenged by the guilt he feels at the prospect of leaving his strong-willed mother - guilt that she is only too happy to reinforce with her tart objections. Well-defined characterisations bring the working-class environment vividly to life(n)

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: Molly Shannon recreates her Saturday Night Live persona as a Catholic schoolgirl who dreams of becoming a Hollywood star and marrying the best-looking boy in school(n)

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: Aliens, believing that a long-cancelled sci-fi series was genuine, land on Earth seeking battle-hardened help. Can the sorry group of actors, who still cling to the shreds of their fame, help out against a vicious, intergalactic adversary?(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A female-led reboot of the classic franchise(n)

programme.title: Thank You for Smoking
programme.desc: Aaron Eckhart lights up the screen in this hilarious satire about a gleefully amoral tobacco industry lobbyist who stops at nothing to put a positive spin on smoking as he clashes with a senator (William H. Macy), who wants to snuff out cigarettes. Maria Bello, Adam Brody, Sam Elliott, Katie Holmes, Rob Lowe. Directed by Jason Reitman(n)

programme.title: Idle Hands
programme.desc: Gruesome horror comedy about a pot-smoking teen slacker (Devon Sawa) who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in coexistence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teens (Nicholas Braun, Josh Fadem, and Mackenzie Davis) must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace their town previously held. Robbie Pickering directs this horror comedy(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: Spunky martial artist Elizabeth Bennet (Lily James) and wealthy zombie killer Mr. Darcy (Sam Riley) fall in love despite their class differences while battling an undead uprising in 19th-century England. Burr Steers directed and adapted the screenplay from Seth Grahame-Smith's novel, which put a ghastly spin on Jane Austen's enduring classic. Lena Headey, Douglas Booth, Matt Smith, Jack Huston, Charles Dance, and Bella Heathcote co-star(n)

programme.title: That Thing You Do!
programme.desc: Warm, nostalgic comedy drama depicting a college band's rise to stardom in the 1960s. After a successful talent show appearance, The Wonders are snapped up by a record company and given their own manager. Setting off on a nationwide tour to promote their first single, 'That Thing You Do!', they encounter all the trappings - and some of the drawbacks - of fame(n)

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: Aliens, believing that a long-cancelled sci-fi series was genuine, land on Earth seeking battle-hardened help. Can the sorry group of actors, who still cling to the shreds of their fame, help out against a vicious, intergalactic adversary?(n)

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: A man tries to figure out why his best friend isn't his mother in this comedy written and directed by Albert Brooks. John Henderson (Brooks) is a neurotic, self-obsessed writer whose relationships with women have been almost uniformly disastrous. Middle-aged and single, John decides that he must come to terms with his problems with women, and he decides to start with the first significant female relationship of his life -- his mother, Beatrice (Debbie Reynolds). John arrives at Beatrice's house and announces that he's moving back into his old room until he can resolve his issues with her. Beatrice politely plays along, but she is more puzzled by John's behavior than anything else. John and Beatrice soon find that they spend less time trying to resolve their differences than arguing if salads can be frozen or if you can really tell the difference between premium ice cream and the supermarket's store brand. Rob Morrow plays John's brother, and Lisa Kudrow plays one of John's less compatible blind dates(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: A comedy about a soldier (Luke Wilson) who awakens in a world filled with dumb people after becoming involved in a futuristic experiment. Maya Rudolph, Dax Shepard. Directed by Mike Judge, who co-wrote the script with Etan Cohen(n)

programme.title: Summer School
programme.desc: High school teacher Mark Harmon finds himself forced to teach English to a class of teenagers each with their own problem or hang-up. Crazy humour and some affecting drama ensues, although the best gags are reserved for Chainsaw and Dave, two horror film-loving teens obsessed with The Texas Chainsaw Massacre(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: 1980s teen comedies finally get the parody they so richly deserve with Wet Hot American Summer, the first feature film from writer/director David Wain and co-screenwriter Michael Showalter, formerly of the sketch comedy troupe the State. It's the last day of the summer season at Camp Firewood, and as camp director Beth (Janeane Garofalo) prepares to wrap things up, the staff of teenage counselors realize this is their last chance to do something about the summer romances that have been brewing for the past three months. Sweet but shy Coop (Michael Showalter) is crazy about pretty Katie (Marguerite Moreau), but there's the problem of her severely moody boyfriend Andy (Paul Rudd). Meanwhile, Victor (Ken Marino) is trying to score with sexy Abby (Marisa Ryan), who is known to make friends easily, and McKinley (Michael Ian Black) and Ben (Bradley Cooper) attempt to keep their hot and heavy relationship a secret. Meanwhile, arts and crafts teacher Gail (Molly Shannon) turns to her students for comfort as her marriage falls apart, drama coach Susie (Amy Poehler) tries to whip the talent show into shape with Ben's help, and camp chef Gene (Christopher Meloni) deals with his unique sexual quirks with the help of a talking can of vegetables (voiced by H. Jon Benjamin). Beth even finds time for romance with socially inept astrophysicist Henry (David Hyde Pierce), but first Henry has to save Camp Firewood from a large piece of space junk about to re-enter Earth's atmosphere. Like Wain and Showalter, Ken Marino, Michael Ian Black, and Joe Lo Truglio (who appears in a small role) were also members of the State; fellow State alumnus Kerri Kenney was cast in a supporting role in the film, but her character didn't appear in the final cut(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: Spunky martial artist Elizabeth Bennet (Lily James) and wealthy zombie killer Mr. Darcy (Sam Riley) fall in love despite their class differences while battling an undead uprising in 19th-century England. Burr Steers directed and adapted the screenplay from Seth Grahame-Smith's novel, which put a ghastly spin on Jane Austen's enduring classic. Lena Headey, Douglas Booth, Matt Smith, Jack Huston, Charles Dance, and Bella Heathcote co-star(n)

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Both laughs and thrills are on the masthead in this comedy drama about a would-be reporter written and directed by Woody Allen. Sondra Pransky (Scarlett Johansson) is an American journalism student who travels to England to visit friends. While in London, she attends a magic show where magician Sid "Splendini" Waterman (Woody Allen) brings her on-stage as part of a trick in which he makes her disappear. However, while waiting to be "de-materialized," she's visited by the ghost of a murdered reporter (Ian McShane), who passes along the scoop of the decade. The spirit claims that Peter Lyman (Hugh Jackman), the wealthy and handsome son of a well-known aristocrat, is leading a double life as "the Tarot Card Killer," a serial murderer who has been terrifying the nation and eluding police. With the magician's help, Jane begins investigating the story and is able to piece together some incriminating evidence against Lyman. However, the more she learns, the more dangerous her investigation becomes -- especially when she falls into a romance with the suspected killer. Scoop was Woody Allen's second consecutive film with leading lady Scarlett Johansson, after the critically acclaimed Match Point; it was also Allen's second feature to be shot in Great Britain(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: A comedy about a soldier (Luke Wilson) who awakens in a world filled with dumb people after becoming involved in a futuristic experiment. Maya Rudolph, Dax Shepard. Directed by Mike Judge, who co-wrote the script with Etan Cohen(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: 1980s teen comedies finally get the parody they so richly deserve with Wet Hot American Summer, the first feature film from writer/director David Wain and co-screenwriter Michael Showalter, formerly of the sketch comedy troupe the State. It's the last day of the summer season at Camp Firewood, and as camp director Beth (Janeane Garofalo) prepares to wrap things up, the staff of teenage counselors realize this is their last chance to do something about the summer romances that have been brewing for the past three months. Sweet but shy Coop (Michael Showalter) is crazy about pretty Katie (Marguerite Moreau), but there's the problem of her severely moody boyfriend Andy (Paul Rudd). Meanwhile, Victor (Ken Marino) is trying to score with sexy Abby (Marisa Ryan), who is known to make friends easily, and McKinley (Michael Ian Black) and Ben (Bradley Cooper) attempt to keep their hot and heavy relationship a secret. Meanwhile, arts and crafts teacher Gail (Molly Shannon) turns to her students for comfort as her marriage falls apart, drama coach Susie (Amy Poehler) tries to whip the talent show into shape with Ben's help, and camp chef Gene (Christopher Meloni) deals with his unique sexual quirks with the help of a talking can of vegetables (voiced by H. Jon Benjamin). Beth even finds time for romance with socially inept astrophysicist Henry (David Hyde Pierce), but first Henry has to save Camp Firewood from a large piece of space junk about to re-enter Earth's atmosphere. Like Wain and Showalter, Ken Marino, Michael Ian Black, and Joe Lo Truglio (who appears in a small role) were also members of the State; fellow State alumnus Kerri Kenney was cast in a supporting role in the film, but her character didn't appear in the final cut(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: The work of international superstar Stephen Chow, Kung Fu Hustle is a humorous, special-effects-filled, action-packed martial arts epic set in early '40s China. A bumbling thief named Sing (Stephen Chow) desires to be the toughest member of the dreaded gangster hit squad known as The Axe Gang, but to completely join the gang he has to commit murder. When Sing attempts to rob a crowded run-down apartment complex known as Pig Sty Alley, the locals begin to defend themselves with some high-flying kung fu skills, and a tiny war erupts between the local masters and the axe-wielding gang. After the gang busts the ancient kung fu king known as The Beast (Leung Siu Lung) out of jail, tensions reach a boiling point as Pig Sty Alley's landlady (Yuen Qiu) leads an all-out attack against the gang and Sing discovers his true heroic fate. Kung Fu Hustle, which set box-office records across Asia during its December 2004 release, also stars Yuen Wah and Xing Yu, and features fight choreography by legendary masters of martial arts cinema Yuen Woo Ping and Sammo Hung(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: Spunky martial artist Elizabeth Bennet (Lily James) and wealthy zombie killer Mr. Darcy (Sam Riley) fall in love despite their class differences while battling an undead uprising in 19th-century England. Burr Steers directed and adapted the screenplay from Seth Grahame-Smith's novel, which put a ghastly spin on Jane Austen's enduring classic. Lena Headey, Douglas Booth, Matt Smith, Jack Huston, Charles Dance, and Bella Heathcote co-star(n)

programme.title: Friday Foster
programme.desc: A woman newspaper photographer investigates a plot to assassinate black politicians, and is drawn into a dangerous adventure among the underworld and political types. From a story by Arthur Marks and based on the Chicago Tribune's comic strip "Friday Foster.'(n)

programme.title: The Journey of August King
programme.desc: This drama chronicles the moral fortitude and courage of a North Carolina farmer in 1815. The trouble begins when a starving runaway slave girl stumbles into the camp of widowed farmer August King. August is a highly-principled man and decides to ignore his own personal risk and help her(n)

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: A Great White shark menaces an outdoor water park that employs the grown son of a small-town police-officer who helped kill a shark that had been threatening their home town(n)

programme.title: Red Hook Summer
programme.desc: In this affectionate slice of life, a boy from Atlanta spends a summer in Brooklyn under the watchful eye of his grandfather, a bishop at a local church, and he connects with a pretty girl who expands his understanding of the world(n)

programme.title: Cry, the Beloved Country
programme.desc: The story of a Zulu Christian Pastor's journey from a quiet Natal province to a modern, sinister Johannesburg in search of his son, his sister and his brother-all of whom have disappeared into an urban quagmire of crime, sin and political intrigue(n)

programme.title: Hotel Rwanda
programme.desc: Terry George's moving, dramatic film is based on a true story from the Rwanda genocide of 1994. Don Cheadle plays Hutu Paul Rusesabagina, manager of a four-star hotel in the capital Kigali, married to Tutsi Tatiana. When the Hutus start massacring Tutsis, he gives refuge to over 1,000 Tutsis in the hotel and its grounds. At first, he uses the hotel's stock of beer, wine and spirits to bribe the marauding murderous Hutu gangs. But as stocks run low, he must use all his diplomatic skills learnt as a successful manager to save not just the lives of the Tutsis but his own and those of his family. The film also stars Nick Nolte as Col Oliver, a UN representative in the capital who finds himself impotent and without any support as the world abandons Rwanda's Tutsis to their terrible fate(n)

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: In this futuristic thriller, set in a postapocalyptic world where emotions have been outlawed, a top government enforcer entrusted with seeking and destroying offenders finds his loyalty questioned when his true feelings are exposed(n)

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman
programme.desc: Richard Gere plays Zack Mayo, a would-be navy pilot whose uptight attitude at training camp makes him the butt of drill sergeant Emil Foley's attentions. Similarly, Mayo's relationship with Paula Pokrifi is equally compromised because of his indifference, until the unexpected and tragic suicide of his best friend Sid Worsley becomes the catalyst for both his professional and personal maturity. Taylor Hackford's film follows its key protagonists through the 13 weeks of training and the emotions that shape all their lives in a film that is at heart an intense love story in a military setting(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday
programme.desc: Gabrielle Union, Morris Chestnut, Queen Latifah, and Terrence Howard star in a film concerning a young girl who implores a department-store Santa to find a new husband for her divorced mother for Christmas. Single mother of three Nancy (Union) has been putting the needs of her three children ahead of her own for as far back as she can remember, and lately her youngest daughter, Emily (Khail Bryant), has become acutely aware of her mother's palpable sadness. As Christmas draws near, Nancy takes her kids to the mall for a cheerful visit with jolly old Saint Nick. When it comes time for Emily's turn to sit on Santa's lap and make her Christmas wish, she selflessly remembers her mother's recent comment that a compliment from a man would be the best gift of all. Determined to make her mother happy again even if it means sacrificing her own wish, Emily relays the message to Santa (Chestnut), not realizing that the man beneath the beard is actually an office-supply salesman and ambitious singer/songwriter named Benjamin. Recognizing the daughter's love for her mother and sensing something truly special in Nancy, Benjamin cheerfully obliges the young girl, setting into motion a series of events that promise to make this the most memorable holiday in quite some time. Lance Rivera directs a film produced by Shakim Compere and Latifah through Flavor Unit Entertainment(n)

programme.title: Hotel Rwanda
programme.desc: Terry George's moving, dramatic film is based on a true story from the Rwanda genocide of 1994. The film also stars Nick Nolte as Col Oliver, a UN representative in the capital who finds himself impotent and without any support as the world abandons Rwanda's Tutsis to their terrible fate(n)

programme.title: Kiss of Death
programme.desc: To win an early release, a convict agrees to go undercover to help a DA gather incriminating evidence on a crime boss(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Time's Up. Angela and the feds push Tommy to flip on Lobos or spend his life in prison, while Ghost considers doing the honorable thing, but the consequences could prove steep(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Ghost Is Dead. In the Season 2 finale, members of Ghost's organization are turning up dead, and each body hits closer to home for him and Tommy as the threat of Kanan and Angela's investigation becomes more imminent(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday

programme.title: Operation: Endgame
programme.desc: In this edgy action-comedy, a new recruit (Joe Anderson) joins an elite gang of assassins charged with protecting the U.S., and he must fight to stay alive when his first day on the job finds him responsible for eliminating a traitor within their ranks(n)

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman
programme.desc: Richard Gere plays Zack Mayo, a would-be navy pilot whose uptight attitude at training camp makes him the butt of drill sergeant Emil Foley's attentions. Similarly, Mayo's relationship with Paula Pokrifi is equally compromised because of his indifference, until the unexpected and tragic suicide of his best friend Sid Worsley becomes the catalyst for both his professional and personal maturity. Taylor Hackford's film follows its key protagonists through the 13 weeks of training and the emotions that shape all their lives in a film that is at heart an intense love story in a military setting(n)

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: A teenager finds himself reaching out to others as he tries to heal his emotional wounds in this drama. Jonathan (Cillian Murphy) is a young man who is having a difficult time coming to terms with the recent death of his father; after falling into a deep depression, he attempts to commit suicide by driving a car off an embankment. Jonathan survives the accident and is sent to a mental institution for treatment. While in the hospital, Jonathan becomes friendly with a disturbed youngster named Toby (Jonathan Jackson), and falls in love with Rachel (Tricia Vessey), another patient at the facility. Also featuring Stephen Rea, On the Edge was the third feature from Irish director John Carney and the first to be backed by a major American studio(n)

programme.title: In My Country
programme.desc: An Afrikaans reporter and an American journalist have an affair while covering a South African investigation into human-rights violations in this earnest drama(n)

programme.title: Buffalo Soldiers
programme.desc: Frank Military and Susan Rhinehart scripted this western, a look back at the post-Civil War Black cavalry troops known as the Buffalo Soldiers, the fierce fighting unit previously covered in a PBS four-parter (1970) and an NBC pilot (1979). In the New Mexico Territory, ex-slave Sgt. Wyatt (Danny Glover) and the Buffalo soldiers arrest Captain Draper (Robert Knott) and other Texas Rangers, but politics mean the Rangers are quietly freed later. Back at Fort Craig, Wyatt reports to anti-black General Pike (Tom Bower) and Col. Grierson (Bob Gunton), a white responsible for assembling and supporting the black regiment. A search is underway for Indian chief Victorio (Harrison Lowe). Indian prophet Nana (Chesley Wilson) is tortured in an effort to get him to reveal Victorio's whereabouts. Determining that Victorio is at Rattlesnake Springs, the Buffalo Soldiers head in that direction for a confrontation. Filmed in the desert of Arizona's Cochise County, Buffalo Soldiers premiered December 7, 1997 on TNT(n)

programme.title: Righteous Kill
programme.desc: The dream team of acting titans Robert De Niro and Al Pacino give commanding performances in this charged psychological thriller. They portray veteran NYPD detectives hot on the trail of a clever serial killer who's been gunning down vicious felons who have been able to escape being convicted of their crimes. Their investigation leads them to a most surprising conclusion. Carla Gugino, Curtis '50 Cent' Jackson, John Leguizamo, Donnie Wahlberg, Brian Dennehy. Directed by Jon Avnet(n)

programme.title: Not Easily Broken
programme.desc: A car accident and shifting affections test the bond between a married couple(n)

programme.title: Obsessed
programme.desc: Enticement leads to terror in this spine-tingling thriller when Lisa, a sexy office temp, forms a dangerous fixation on a successful and happily married asset manager named Derek. As her obsession progresses to stalking, Derek's idyllic marriage and promising career slowly disintegrate, until the once-happy couple and their newborn are forced into hiding as Lisa's wrath threatens to destroy them entirely(n)

programme.title: The Glass Shield
programme.desc: A young ambitious black cop joins an all-white police department and struggles to hold his own and restore justice as racial tensions run high(n)

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: Daniel Craig oozes charisma in this complex thriller. He plays a drug dealer who wants to retire but is forced to take another assignment by his menacing supplier. Colm Meaney, Kenneth Cranham, George Harris, Jamie Foreman, Sienna Miller, Michael Gambon(n)

programme.title: Righteous Kill
programme.desc: The dream team of acting titans Robert De Niro and Al Pacino give commanding performances in this charged psychological thriller. They portray veteran NYPD detectives hot on the trail of a clever serial killer who's been gunning down vicious felons who have been able to escape being convicted of their crimes. Their investigation leads them to a most surprising conclusion. Carla Gugino, Curtis '50 Cent' Jackson, John Leguizamo, Donnie Wahlberg, Brian Dennehy. Directed by Jon Avnet(n)

programme.title: Obsessed
programme.desc: Enticement leads to terror in this spine-tingling thriller when Lisa, a sexy office temp, forms a dangerous fixation on a successful and happily married asset manager named Derek. As her obsession progresses to stalking, Derek's idyllic marriage and promising career slowly disintegrate, until the once-happy couple and their newborn are forced into hiding as Lisa's wrath threatens to destroy them entirely(n)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: In this high-octane sequel packed with exciting car chases and martial-arts battles, an ex-Special Forces operative (Jason Statham) is working as a chauffeur for a wealthy family and springs into action when his employers' young son is kidnapped. Alessandro Gassman, Amber Valletta, Kate Nauta, Matthew Modine. Directed by Louis Leterrier(n)

programme.title: Vanishing Wilderness
programme.desc: Actor Rex Allen, narrator of many a Disney true-life adventure, takes on the voiceover chores of the Disneyesque The Vanishing Wilderness. Per its title, this documentary focuses in on several endangered species, ranging from polar bears to alligators (this, of course, was before the gator overpopulation problem in the everglades). The visuals cannot be faulted; we wish the same could be said concerning that omniprescent choral background music. Also, much as we like Mr. Allen, we do wish that he'd let some of the images speak for themselves. But Vanishing Wilderness is well worth one's time-far more so than the dogmatic publications issued with utter lack of entertainment value by various ecological organizations(n)

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: Una vez más se acerca la Navidad, y los miembros de la familia Rodríguez se están congregando en la residencia familial de sus padres, en Chicago, para celebrar estas fechas y dar gracias por el regreso de la guerra del hermano menor. Sano y salvo después(n)

programme.title: Aquamarine
programme.desc: Friends Claire and Hailey are looking forward to a summer spent swimming, shopping and falling in love with the lifeguard. Then they find a beautiful mermaid washed up in the pool, and help her find a man on dry land(n)

programme.title: Next Avengers: Heroes of Tomorrow
programme.desc: When a nefarious villain named Ultron emerges to threaten mankind, the next generation of superheroes leaps into action and prepares to make their famous parents proud. It's been decades since Ultron defeated the original Avengers, and these days even the few folks that had held out hope for the future are finally ready to admit defeat. But Tony Stark has a surprise up his sleeve in the form of four amazing teenagers who just might have the power to defeat Ultron once and for all. But will James (son of Captain America and Black Widow), Pym (son of Wasp and Giant Man), Torunn (daughter of Thor) and Azari (son of the Black Panther) truly be capable of defeating the villain who brought about the downfall of their powerful parents? As the battle gets underway and Hawkeye's sharp-shooting son leaps into the fray, the team realizes that they might stand a fighting chance if they can only track down the mission Hulk and encourage him to become a member of the team. Should they succeed in defeating Ultron, this group will forever be known as The Next Avengers(n)

programme.title: Angela Anaconda
programme.desc: Bathroom Blues; Garbage Swingers. Included: Uncle Nicky participates in community service by picking up people's garbage(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington Bear
programme.sub-title: A Day to Remember; Paddington in Spain; A Most Unusual Ceremony
programme.desc: A Day to Remember; Paddington in Spain; A Most Unusual Ceremony. Harold and Deirdre ask Paddington to be an usher at their wedding; at the flamenco festival in Seville, Spain, Paddington whips up some sticky marmalade; and while visiting Sir Huntley Martin's marmalade factory, Paddington is mistaken for a worker(n)

programme.title: Connie the Cow
programme.sub-title: Connie's Orchestra; A Different Breakfast; Lots and Lots of Walnuts!
programme.desc: Connie's Orchestra; A Different Breakfast; Lots and Lots of Walnuts!. Connie and friends make their own instruments and start an orchestra; Patch and Connie travel a long way in search of sweet corn(n)

programme.title: Thomas Edison's Secret Lab
programme.sub-title: The Monster Not Under the Bed; Nanobots Byte
programme.desc: The Monster Not Under the Bed; Nanobots Byte. The kids shrink themselves to prove to Joelle that there are no monsters hiding under her bed; and Angie's garbage-eating nanobytes escape from the lab(n)

programme.title: Liberty's Kids
programme.desc: We the People. George Washington becomes the first president; James Madison (voice of Warren Buffet) writes much of the Constitution; Moses resolves to open a school for free black children. Voices include Cork Ramer (Washington), Walter Cronkite (Ben Franklin), Reo Jones (Sarah), D. Kevin Williams (Moses)(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbours Barney and Betty Rubble adopt a child, much to the dismay of Fred's mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred being promoted while Barney is left in the dole queue(n)

programme.title: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
programme.desc: Nobody does the "let's put on a show" song-and-dance extravaganza like this Disney franchise. In this splashy outing, the gang is faced with life decisions about their futures, especially those of Troy and Gabriella (Zac Efron, Vanessa Anne Hudgens), whose relationship could be impacted by the possibility that they might be attending different colleges in the fall. Ashley Tisdale, Lucas Grabeel, Corbin Bleu, Monique Coleman. Kenny Ortega directed(n)

programme.title: Car's Life: Junkyard Blues
programme.desc: Sparky the little red sports car investigates strange happenings affecting his fellow vehicles(n)

programme.title: Sydney White
programme.desc: Modern American retelling of the fairytale Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs. Sydney White goes away to college and enrols in the same sorority house her mother used to be in, only to find that girls these days aren't as nice as her mother. Moving in with seven social outcasts in the run down frat house next door, she takes on the system and tries to show the college cool kids how selfish their hierarchy has become(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II
programme.desc: Paul Hogan tangles with drug lords to free his kidnapped girlfriend(n)

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama
programme.desc: A fashion designer is torn between marrying a wealthy New Yorker and going back to her hubby in Alabama. She heads south to finalise her divorce, but the more time she spends with her old flame, the more she feels sparks flying between them again(n)

programme.desc: An ambitious teenager discovers a pin that transports her to a futuristic world. She then teams up with a jaded genius, and they embark on an adventure through time and space to save the Earth(n)

programme.desc: A small dolphin with big dreams leaves the security of his pod to find his destiny in this rousing animated adventure directed by Eduardo Schuldt(n)

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: A wealthy tycoon whose life is orderly and happy finds his household disrupted by the arrival of a young man called Joe Black. His daughter falls for the young man innocent of the fact that Joe is Death, visiting Earth to take the life of her father..(n)

Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Tim Burton's retelling of Roald Dahl's classic children's story. A young boy from a poor family wins one of five golden tickets granting him a tour of a wonderful chocolate factory run by an eccentric confectioner. programme.title: Alice in Wonderland
programme.desc: Director Tim Burton and screenwriter Linda Woolverton (Beauty and the Beast, The Lion King) team up to deliver this visually dazzling take on the classic Lewis Carroll tale. Nineteen-year-old Alice (Mia Wasikowska) is attending party at a lavish country estate when she sees a white rabbit with a pocket watch dart into the bushes. Curious, she follows the rabbit to an enormous tree, and tumbles down a hole that takes her to Underland, a strange world inhabited by anthropomorphic creatures in search of someone to save them from the dreaded Red Queen (Helena Bonham Carter), who has assumed control of the kingdom by decapitating anyone who dares disagree with her. According to a scroll detailing a historical timeline of Underland -- including events that have not yet taken place -- it is Alice who will set the kingdom free by defeating the Jabberwocky, a powerful dragon-like creature under the control of the Red Queen. But is this Alice the same Alice who appears in the scroll? While some of the creatures of Underland have their doubts, the Mad Hatter (Johnny Depp) and his friends are certain she's the same girl who previously visited them years ago. When the Red Queen kidnaps the Mad Hatter, Alice attempts to free her friend and locate the one weapon with the power to slay the Jabberwocky, thereby restoring the White Queen (Anne Hathaway) to the throne, and bringing peace back to Underland(n)

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: Do we control our destiny, or do unseen forces manipulate us? Matt Damon stars in the thriller The Adjustment Bureau as a man who glimpses the future Fate has planned for him and realizes he wants something else. To get it, he must pursue the only woman he¿s ever loved across, under and through the streets of modern-day New York. On the brink of winning a seat in the U.S. Senate, ambitious politician David Norris (Damon) meets beautiful contemporary ballet dancer Elise Sellas (Emily Blunt)¿a woman like none he¿s ever known. But just as he realizes he¿s falling for her, mysterious men conspire to keep the two apart. David learns he is up against the agents of Fate itself¿the men of The Adjustment Bureau¿who will do everything in their considerable power to prevent David and Elise from being together. In the face of overwhelming odds, he must either let her go and accept a predetermined path¿or risk everything to defy Fate and be with her(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Static. Dean Jagger stars as Ed Lindsay, a cranky middle-aged man living in a boarding house with several other old-timers, including his former fiancée Vinnie Brown (Carmen Mathews). Fed up with television, Ed squirrels himself away in his room, where he begins tooling around with the antique radio he's found in the cellar. Before long, he is receiving broadcasts from the 1930s and 1940s -- live broadcasts, not reruns. Having opened a window to the past, Ed desperately tries to correct several mistakes he's made in life. Scripted by Charles Beaumont from a story by OCee Ritch, "Static" was one of six videotaped Twilight Zone episodes and was originally telecast March 10, 1961 (and yes, that voice emanating from Ed's old-time radio does belong to future Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane)(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Prime Mover. Upon discovering that his business partner Jimbo Cobb (Buddy Ebsen) possesses psychokinetic powers enabling him to move things with his brain power alone, café owner and compulsive gambler Ace Larsen (Dane Clark) hightails it to Las Vegas with Jimbo in tow. It is Ace's contention that Jimbo's unsual gift will enable him to "fix" dice games and roulette wheels without detection, and for a while this proves to be the case. But what Ace hasn't counted on is the fact that Jimbo has a conscience -- and that Jimbo is disgusted by Ace's cavalier treatment of his erstwhile girlfriend Kitty Cavanaugh (Christine White). Scripted by Charles Beaumont from a story by George Clayton Johnson, "The Prime Mover" made its Twilight Zone debut on March 24, 1961(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Family Friend. The show follows a crime, ususally adapted from current headlines, from two separate vantage points. The first half of the show concentrates on the investigation of the crime by the police, the second half follows the prosecution of the crime in court(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Heart of Darkness. Law & Order returns for a 16th series of crime-fighting on the mean streets of New York. Each dramatic episode enters the seedy urban jungle and follows a team of detectives as they track down suspects and make arrests. Then the DA's office takes over and the courtroom drama unfolds until justice finally prevails. Starring Sam Waterston as Assistant District Attorney Jack McCoy, Jerry Orbach as Detective Lennie Briscoe, S Epatha Merkerson as Lieutenant Anita Van Buren and Elisabeth Rohm as Assistant District Attorney Serena Southerlyn(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Identity. Police drama series. After a young executive is found dead, the investigation suggests identity theft when it is revealed that the man had just lost his job but gained $400,000(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Floater. Briscoe and Green investigate a body in the river, leading to a corruption scandal involving lawyers and a judge(n)

programme.title: Arrow

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Three Faces of Phoebe. Phoebe casts a spell to try to figure out if she should marry Cole, but her incantation backfires and causes her future self and her past self to emerge as individual beings. Meanwhile, chaos in the underworld puts the sisters in harm's way as a demon plots to rule the netherworld by vanquishing the Halliwells(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Marry-Go-Round. Phoebe makes her wedding preparations, completely unaware that the Source now has total control over Cole. The Seer informs the Source that if Phoebe and Cole can be married in a dark ritual rather than the usual wedding ceremony, their future son will be the most powerful evil being ever known(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Fifth Halliwheel. Paige feels like a spare part when she sees both of her happily married sisters, but retains her suspicions about Cole(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Tall Tales. Sam and Dean call on fellow hunter Bobby for help with violent occurrences on a university campus, but Bobby has suspicions about both the culprit and the brothers' escalating feud(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Witch in the Wardrobe. Brennan and Booth get a quick tutorial in Wicca after two bodies, one dating to the 17th-century Salem witch trials, are discovered in a cabin in the woods. Meanwhile, Hodgins and Angela wind up in jail thanks to the former's driving style(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Boy With the Answer. The fourth series finale saw a fantasy sequence in which Brennan and Booth were a married couple running a night club, a scenario that saw them finally seal the deal on their relationship. The episode's conclusion revealed the hallucination/dream came from the mind of a drugged-up Booth, who had undergone surgery for a brain tumour. As Brennan kept a vigil at his bedside, the cop came round from his operation unsure of who she was. Season five picks up a few weeks later and Booth is back at work, but still suffering with side effects from his memory loss(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Beginning in the End. In the fifth-season finale, the strange death of a hoarder puts the team to work sifting through his many possessions for clues. Meanwhile, Angela gets a visit from her father(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Mastodon in the Room. Season 6 begins seven months after the Jeffersonian team went its separate ways, but they're summoned back to Washington, DC by Caroline Julian when a case involving the body of an unidentified young boy could cost Cam her job(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Couple in the Cave. A surprise visit by Booth's girlfriend, war correspondent Hannah Burley, forces Brennan to take another look at her relationship with Booth. Meanwhile, the team tries to identify a couple whose remains were found in a cave in a national park(n)

programme.desc: With the Games destroyed, heroine Katniss Everdeen must become a symbol of rebellion and take the fight to the Capitol(n)

programme.desc: A witch curses a baker and his wife, binding their fates to those of numerous fairy tale characters including Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood, Rapunzel and Jack of "Jack and the Beanstalk" in this Stephen Sonheim musical(n)

programme.desc: Ho'ohuli Na'au. A famous fashion photographer who is in Hawaii to shoot a sports magazine's annual swimsuit edition is murdered when his trailer is torched with him inside. The probe reveals the victim was heavily in debt and engaged to be married. Meanwhile, Chin considers lying to investigators to keep his ex-cop uncle from going to prison for stealing $200,000 from the department(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Embedded. Police drama series. When a reporter embedded in Iraq reveals too much about his unit's position and is shot on returning to New York, suspicion falls on the army(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Compassion. The murder of a con man leads detectives to one of his victims, a dedicated doctor who treats terminally ill children. In court, McCoy struggles to prove that the motive for the murder was revenge and not insanity(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Ill-Conceived. Briscoe and Green investigate when the owner of a clothing company is found beaten to death in his office - and discover the deceased was the father of an employee's recently born child. The detectives' suspicion falls on the woman's boyfriend, who may have suspected his girlfriend was having an affair(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Darwinian. McCoy and Southerlyn arrest a homeless man on suspicion of killing a fellow vagrant and gather enough evidence to bring a prosecution - but a clever defence attorney tries to get him exonerated by arguing that the laws of decent society do not apply to people who live on the streets(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Payback. Briscoe and Green investigate the murder of a bookmaker whose testimony led to the incarceration of a Mob boss 10 years previously. The trail leads to a reputable businessman with a sideline in contract killing who appears to be taking orders from the Mafia(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Married With Children. Briscoe and Green investigate the case of a motivational speaker who died after being pushed from a hotel balcony, and find themselves caught up in a protest against gay adoption laws(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Tabloid. Tabloid journalism comes under scrutiny during a murder case involving a prominent man who blames his wife's death on a gossip columnist(n)
